00188 #define CELL_MERC                                     0x00000001
00189 #define CELL_MILITIA                            0x00000002
00190 #define CELL_ELITE                                    0x00000004
00191 #define CELL_TROOP                                    0x00000008
00192 #define     CELL_ADMIN                                0x00000010

00196 #define CELL_YM_CREATURE                  0x00000100

00199 #define CELL_TEAMLEADER                   0x00000200

00362 void EliminateAllMercs()
00363 {
00364       SOLDIERCELL *pAttacker = NULL;
00365       INT32 i, iNum = 0;
00366       if( gpAR )
00367       {
00368             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
00369             {
00370                   if( gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->bLife )
00371                   {
00372                         pAttacker = &gpEnemies[ i ];
00373                         break;
00374                   }
00375             }
00376             if( pAttacker )
00377             {
00378                   for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
00379                   {
00380                         if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife )
00381                         {
00382                               iNum++;
00383                               gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife = 1;
00384                               gpMercs[ i ].usNextHit[0] = (UINT16)(250 * iNum);
00385                               gpMercs[ i ].usHitDamage[0] = 100;
00386                               gpMercs[ i ].pAttacker[0] = pAttacker;
00387                         }
00388                   }
00389             }
00390       }
00391 }
00392 
00393 void EliminateAllFriendlies()
00394 {
00395       INT32 i;
00396       if( gpAR )
00397       {
00398             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
00399             {
00400                   gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife = 0;
00401             }
00402             gpAR->ubAliveMercs = 0;
00403             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubCivs; i++ )
00404             {
00405                   gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife = 0;
00406             }
00407             gpAR->ubAliveCivs = 0;
00408       }
00409 }
00410 
00411 void EliminateAllEnemies( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY )
00412 {
00413       GROUP *pGroup, *pDeleteGroup;
00414       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00415       INT32 i;
00416       UINT8 ubNumEnemies[ NUM_ENEMY_RANKS ];
00417       UINT8 ubRankIndex;
00418 
00419       //Clear any possible battle locator
00420       gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;
00421 
00422       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00423       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( ubSectorX, ubSectorY ) ];
00424 
00425 
00426       // if we're doing this from the Pre-Battle interface, gpAR is NULL, and RemoveAutoResolveInterface(0 won't happen, so
00427       // we must process the enemies killed right here & give out loyalty bonuses as if the battle had been fought & won
00428       if( !gpAR )
00429       {
00430             GetNumberOfEnemiesInSector( ubSectorX, ubSectorY, &ubNumEnemies[ 0 ], &ubNumEnemies[ 1 ], &ubNumEnemies[ 2 ] );
00431 
00432             for ( ubRankIndex = 0; ubRankIndex < NUM_ENEMY_RANKS; ubRankIndex++ )
00433             {
00434                   for ( i = 0; i < ubNumEnemies[ ubRankIndex ]; i++ )
00435                   {
00436                         if( ProcessLoyalty() )HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_ENEMY_KILLED, ubSectorX, ubSectorY, 0 );
00437                         TrackEnemiesKilled( ENEMY_KILLED_IN_AUTO_RESOLVE, RankIndexToSoldierClass( ubRankIndex ) );
00438                   }
00439             }
00440 
00441             if( ProcessLoyalty() )HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_BATTLE_WON, ubSectorX, ubSectorY, 0 );
00442       }
00443 
00444       if( !gpAR || gpAR->ubBattleStatus != BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS )
00445       {
00446             //Remove the defend force here.
00447             pSector->ubNumTroops = 0;
00448             pSector->ubNumElites = 0;
00449             pSector->ubNumAdmins = 0;
00450             pSector->ubNumCreatures = 0;
00451             pSector->bLastKnownEnemies = 0;
00452             //Remove the mobile forces here, but only if battle is over.
00453             while( pGroup )
00454             {
00455                   if( !pGroup->fPlayer && pGroup->ubSectorX == ubSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == ubSectorY )
00456                   {
00457                         ClearPreviousAIGroupAssignment( pGroup );
00458                         pDeleteGroup = pGroup;
00459                         pGroup = pGroup->next;
00460                         if( gpBattleGroup == pDeleteGroup )
00461                               gpBattleGroup = NULL;
00462                         RemovePGroup( pDeleteGroup );
00463                   }
00464                   else
00465                         pGroup = pGroup->next;
00466             }
00467             if( gpBattleGroup )
00468             {
00469                   CalculateNextMoveIntention( gpBattleGroup );
00470             }
00471             // set this sector as taken over
00472             SetThisSectorAsPlayerControlled( ubSectorX, ubSectorY, 0, TRUE );
00473             RecalculateSectorWeight( (UINT8)SECTOR( ubSectorX, ubSectorY ) );
00474 
00475             // dirty map panel
00476             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00477       }
00478 
00479       if( gpAR )
00480       {
00481             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
00482             {
00483                   gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->bLife = 0;
00484             }
00485             gpAR->ubAliveEnemies = 0;
00486       }
00487       gpBattleGroup = NULL;
00488 }

00490 #define ORIG_LEFT             26
00491 #define ORIG_TOP              53
00492 #define ORIG_RIGHT            92
00493 #define ORIG_BOTTOM           84
00494 
00495 void DoTransitionFromPreBattleInterfaceToAutoResolve()
00496 {
00497       SGPRect SrcRect, DstRect;
00498       UINT32 uiStartTime, uiCurrTime;
00499       INT32 iPercentage, iFactor;
00500       UINT32 uiTimeRange;
00501       INT16 sStartLeft, sEndLeft, sStartTop, sEndTop;
00502       INT32 iLeft, iTop, iWidth, iHeight;
00503 
00504       PauseTime( FALSE );
00505 
00506       gpAR->fShowInterface = TRUE;
00507       
00508       SrcRect.iLeft = gpAR->Rect.iLeft;
00509       SrcRect.iTop = gpAR->Rect.iTop;
00510       SrcRect.iRight = gpAR->Rect.iRight;
00511       SrcRect.iBottom = gpAR->Rect.iBottom;
00512 
00513       iWidth = SrcRect.iRight - SrcRect.iLeft + 1;
00514       iHeight = SrcRect.iBottom - SrcRect.iTop + 1;
00515       
00516       uiTimeRange = 1000;
00517       iPercentage = 0;
00518       uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
00519 
00520       sStartLeft = 59;
00521       sStartTop = 69;
00522       sEndLeft = SrcRect.iLeft + gpAR->sWidth / 2;
00523       sEndTop = SrcRect.iTop + gpAR->sHeight / 2;
00524 
00525       //save the prebattle/mapscreen interface background
00526       BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiEXTRABUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00527 
00528       //render the autoresolve panel
00529       RenderAutoResolve();
00530       RenderButtons();
00531       RenderButtonsFastHelp();
00532       //save it
00533       BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, (UINT16)SrcRect.iLeft, (UINT16)SrcRect.iTop, (UINT16)SrcRect.iRight, (UINT16)SrcRect.iBottom );
00534       
00535       //hide the autoresolve
00536       BlitBufferToBuffer( guiEXTRABUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, (UINT16)SrcRect.iLeft, (UINT16)SrcRect.iTop, (UINT16)SrcRect.iRight, (UINT16)SrcRect.iBottom );
00537 
00538       PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "SOUNDS\\Laptop power up (8-11).wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
00539       while( iPercentage < 100  )
00540       {
00541             uiCurrTime = GetJA2Clock();
00542             iPercentage = (uiCurrTime-uiStartTime) * 100 / uiTimeRange;
00543             iPercentage = min( iPercentage, 100 );
00544 
00545             //Factor the percentage so that it is modified by a gravity falling acceleration effect.
00546             iFactor = (iPercentage - 50) * 2;
00547             if( iPercentage < 50 )
00548                   iPercentage = (UINT32)(iPercentage + iPercentage * iFactor * 0.01 + 0.5);
00549             else
00550                   iPercentage = (UINT32)(iPercentage + (100-iPercentage) * iFactor * 0.01 + 0.05);
00551 
00552             //Calculate the center point.
00553             iLeft = sStartLeft + (sEndLeft-sStartLeft+1) * iPercentage / 100;
00554             iTop = sStartTop + (sEndTop-sStartTop+1) * iPercentage / 100;
00555 
00556             DstRect.iLeft = iLeft - iWidth * iPercentage / 200;
00557             DstRect.iRight = DstRect.iLeft + max( iWidth * iPercentage / 100, 1 );
00558             DstRect.iTop = iTop - iHeight * iPercentage / 200;
00559             DstRect.iBottom = DstRect.iTop + max( iHeight * iPercentage / 100, 1 );
00560 
00561             BltStretchVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, 0, &SrcRect, &DstRect );
00562             InvalidateScreen();
00563             RefreshScreen( NULL );
00564 
00565             //Restore the previous rect.
00566             BlitBufferToBuffer( guiEXTRABUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, (UINT16)DstRect.iLeft, (UINT16)DstRect.iTop, 
00567                   (UINT16)(DstRect.iRight-DstRect.iLeft+1), (UINT16)(DstRect.iBottom-DstRect.iTop+1) );
00568       }
00569       //BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, 640, 480 );
00570 }
00571 
00572 extern UINT8 guiDirNumber;
00573 
00574 void EnterAutoResolveMode( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY )
00575 {
00576       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00577             CountRandomCalls( TRUE );
00578       #endif
00579 
00580 
00581       guiDirNumber = 0;
00582 
00583       //Set up mapscreen for removal
00584       SetPendingNewScreen( AUTORESOLVE_SCREEN );
00585       CreateDestroyMapInvButton();
00586       RenderButtons();
00587 
00588       //Kaiden: Setting Ja2_Options.ini file to be read
00589 
00590 DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"Autoresolve1");
00591       //Allocate memory for all the globals while we are in this mode.
00592       gpAR = (AUTORESOLVE_STRUCT*)MemAlloc( sizeof( AUTORESOLVE_STRUCT ) );
00593       Assert( gpAR );
00594       memset( gpAR, 0, sizeof( AUTORESOLVE_STRUCT ) );
00595       //Mercs -- 20 max
00596       gpMercs = (SOLDIERCELL*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SOLDIERCELL) * 20 );
00597       Assert( gpMercs );
00598       memset( gpMercs, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERCELL ) * 20 );
00599       //Militia -- MAX_ALLOWABLE_MILITIA_PER_SECTOR max
00600       gpCivs = (SOLDIERCELL*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SOLDIERCELL) * MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE  );
00601       Assert( gpCivs );
00602       memset( gpCivs, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERCELL ) * MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE  );
00603       //Enemies -- 32 max
00604       gpEnemies = (SOLDIERCELL*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SOLDIERCELL) * MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE  );
00605       Assert( gpEnemies );
00606       memset( gpEnemies, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERCELL ) * MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE  );
00607 
00608       //Set up autoresolve 
00609       gpAR->fEnteringAutoResolve = TRUE;
00610       gpAR->ubSectorX = ubSectorX;
00611       gpAR->ubSectorY = ubSectorY;
00612       gpAR->ubBattleStatus = BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS;
00613       gpAR->uiTimeSlice = 1000;
00614       gpAR->uiTotalElapsedBattleTimeInMilliseconds = 0;
00615       gpAR->fSound = TRUE;
00616       gpAR->fMoraleEventsHandled = FALSE;
00617       gpAR->uiPreRandomIndex = guiPreRandomIndex;
00618 
00619       //Determine who gets the defensive advantage
00620       switch( gubEnemyEncounterCode )
00621       {
00622             case ENEMY_ENCOUNTER_CODE:
00623                   gpAR->ubPlayerDefenceAdvantage = 21; //Skewed to the player's advantage for convenience purposes.
00624                   break;
00625             case ENEMY_INVASION_CODE:
00626                   gpAR->ubPlayerDefenceAdvantage = 0; 
00627                   break;
00628             case CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE:
00629                   gpAR->ubPlayerDefenceAdvantage = 0;
00630                   break;
00631             default:
00632                   //shouldn't happen
00633                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION   
00634                         ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Autoresolving with entering enemy sector code %d -- illegal KM:1", gubEnemyEncounterCode );
00635                   #endif
00636                   break;
00637       }
00638 }
00639 
00640 UINT32 AutoResolveScreenInit()
00641 {
00642       return TRUE;
00643 }
00644 
00645 UINT32 AutoResolveScreenShutdown()
00646 {
00647       gpBattleGroup = NULL;
00648       return TRUE;
00649 }
00650 
00651 UINT32 AutoResolveScreenHandle()
00652 {
00653       RestoreBackgroundRects();
00654 
00655       if( !gpAR )
00656       {
00657             gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
00658             return MAP_SCREEN;
00659       }
00660       if( gpAR->fEnteringAutoResolve )
00661       {
00662             UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00663             UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00664             SGPRect ClipRect;
00665             gpAR->fEnteringAutoResolve = FALSE;
00666             //Take the framebuffer, shade it, and save it to the SAVEBUFFER.
00667             ClipRect.iLeft = 0;
00668             ClipRect.iTop = 0;
00669             /*ClipRect.iRight = 640;
00670             ClipRect.iBottom = 480;*/
00671             ClipRect.iRight = SCREEN_WIDTH;
00672             ClipRect.iBottom = SCREEN_HEIGHT;
00673 
00674             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00675             Blt16BPPBufferShadowRect( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &ClipRect );
00676             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00677             //BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, 640, 480 );
00678             BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00679             KillPreBattleInterface();
00680             CalculateAutoResolveInfo();
00681             CalculateSoldierCells( FALSE );
00682             CreateAutoResolveInterface();
00683             DetermineTeamLeader( TRUE ); //friendly team
00684             DetermineTeamLeader( FALSE ); //enemy team
00685             CalculateAttackValues();
00686             if( gfExtraBuffer )
00687             {
00688                   DoTransitionFromPreBattleInterfaceToAutoResolve();
00689             }
00690             else
00691                   gpAR->fExpanding = TRUE;
00692             gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve = TRUE;
00693       }
00694       if( gpAR->fExitAutoResolve )
00695       {
00696             gfEnteringMapScreen = TRUE;
00697             RemoveAutoResolveInterface( TRUE );
00698             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00699             {
00700                   UINT32 uiRandoms, uiPreRandoms;
00701                   GetRandomCalls( &uiRandoms, &uiPreRandoms );
00702             }
00703             #endif
00704             return MAP_SCREEN;
00705       }
00706       if( gpAR->fPendingSurrender )
00707       {
00708             gpAR->uiPrevTime = gpAR->uiCurrTime = GetJA2Clock();
00709 
00710       }
00711       else if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS && !gpAR->fExpanding )
00712       {
00713             ProcessBattleFrame();
00714       }
00715       HandleAutoResolveInput();
00716       RenderAutoResolve();
00717 
00718       
00719       SaveBackgroundRects();
00720       RenderButtons();
00721       RenderButtonsFastHelp();
00722       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
00723       EndFrameBufferRender();
00724       return AUTORESOLVE_SCREEN;
00725 }
00726 
00727 void RefreshMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00728 {
00729       pSoldier->bLife = pSoldier->bLifeMax;
00730       pSoldier->bBleeding = 0;
00731       pSoldier->bBreath = pSoldier->bBreathMax = 100;
00732       pSoldier->sBreathRed = 0;
00733       if( gpAR->pRobotCell)
00734       {
00735             UpdateRobotControllerGivenRobot( gpAR->pRobotCell->pSoldier );
00736       }
00737       //gpAR->fUnlimitedAmmo = TRUE;
00738 }
00739 
00740 //Now assign the pSoldier->ubGroupIDs for the enemies, so we know where to remove them.  Start with
00741 //stationary groups first.
00742 void AssociateEnemiesWithStrategicGroups()
00743 {
00744       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00745       GROUP *pGroup;
00746       UINT8 ubNumAdmins, ubNumTroops, ubNumElites;
00747       UINT8 ubISNumAdmins, ubISNumTroops, ubISNumElites;
00748       UINT8 ubNumElitesInGroup, ubNumTroopsInGroup, ubNumAdminsInGroup;
00749       INT32 i;
00750       UINT8 pSectors[4];
00751       UINT8 ubDirAmount;
00752       UINT8 ubCurrSI;
00753 
00754       if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
00755             return;
00756 
00757       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY ) ];
00758 
00759       //grab the number of each type in the stationary sector
00760       ubNumAdmins = pSector->ubNumAdmins;
00761       ubNumTroops = pSector->ubNumTroops;
00762       ubNumElites = pSector->ubNumElites;
00763 
00764       //Now go through our enemies in the autoresolve array, and assign the ubGroupID to the soldier
00765       //Stationary groups have a group ID of 0
00766       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
00767       {
00768             if( gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_ELITE && ubNumElites )
00769             {
00770                   gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
00771                   gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00772                   ubNumElites--;
00773             }
00774             else if( gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_TROOP && ubNumTroops )
00775             {
00776                   gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
00777                   gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00778                   ubNumTroops--;
00779             }
00780             else if( gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_ADMIN && ubNumAdmins )
00781             {
00782                   gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
00783                   gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00784                   ubNumAdmins--;
00785             }
00786       }
00787 
00788       ubNumAdmins = gpAR->ubAdmins - pSector->ubNumAdmins;
00789       ubNumTroops = gpAR->ubTroops - pSector->ubNumTroops;
00790       ubNumElites = gpAR->ubElites - pSector->ubNumElites;
00791       
00792       if( !ubNumElites && !ubNumTroops && !ubNumAdmins )
00793       { //All troops accounted for.
00794             return;
00795       }
00796 
00797       //Now assign the rest of the soldiers to groups
00798       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00799       while( pGroup )
00800       {
00801             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && pGroup->ubSectorX == gpAR->ubSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gpAR->ubSectorY )
00802             {
00803                   ubNumElitesInGroup = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites;
00804                   ubNumTroopsInGroup = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops;
00805                   ubNumAdminsInGroup = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins;
00806                   for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
00807                   {
00808                         if( !(gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_ASSIGNED) )
00809                         {
00810                               if( ubNumElites && ubNumElitesInGroup )
00811                               {
00812                                     gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
00813                                     gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00814                                     ubNumElites--;
00815                                     ubNumElitesInGroup--;
00816                               }
00817                               else if( ubNumTroops && ubNumTroopsInGroup )
00818                               {
00819                                     gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
00820                                     gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00821                                     ubNumTroops--;
00822                                     ubNumTroopsInGroup--;
00823                               }
00824                               else if( ubNumAdmins && ubNumAdminsInGroup )
00825                               {
00826                                     gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
00827                                     gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00828                                     ubNumAdmins--;
00829                                     ubNumAdminsInGroup--;
00830                               }
00831                         }
00832                   }
00833             }
00834             pGroup = pGroup->next;
00835       }
00836 
00837 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Reinforcement
00838 
00839       pGroup = gpGroupList;
00840       while( pGroup )
00841       {     // Don't process road block. It'll be processed as static
00842             if( pGroup->ubGroupID &&  !pGroup->fPlayer && IsGroupInARightSectorToReinforce( pGroup, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY ) )
00843             {
00844                   ubNumElitesInGroup = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites;
00845                   ubNumTroopsInGroup = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops;
00846                   ubNumAdminsInGroup = pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins;
00847                   for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
00848                   {
00849                         if( !(gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_ASSIGNED) )
00850                         {
00851                               if( ubNumElites && ubNumElitesInGroup )
00852                               {
00853                                     gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
00854                                     gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00855                                     ubNumElites--;
00856                                     ubNumElitesInGroup--;
00857                               }
00858                               else if( ubNumTroops && ubNumTroopsInGroup )
00859                               {
00860                                     gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
00861                                     gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00862                                     ubNumTroops--;
00863                                     ubNumTroopsInGroup--;
00864                               }
00865                               else if( ubNumAdmins && ubNumAdminsInGroup )
00866                               {
00867                                     gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = pGroup->ubGroupID;
00868                                     gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00869                                     ubNumAdmins--;
00870                                     ubNumAdminsInGroup--;
00871                               }
00872                         }
00873                   }
00874             }
00875             pGroup = pGroup->next;
00876       }
00877 
00878 
00879 // Set GroupID = 0 for the rest
00880       ubDirAmount = GetAdjacentSectors( pSectors, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
00881 
00882       for( ubCurrSI = 0; ubCurrSI < ubDirAmount; ubCurrSI++ )
00883       {
00884             pSector = &SectorInfo[ pSectors[ ubCurrSI ] ];
00885 
00886             ubISNumAdmins = pSector->ubNumAdmins;
00887             ubISNumTroops = pSector->ubNumTroops;
00888             ubISNumElites = pSector->ubNumElites;
00889 
00890             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
00891             {
00892                   if( ubISNumAdmins + ubISNumTroops + ubISNumElites <= gubReinforcementMinEnemyStaticGroupSize ) break;
00893 
00894                   if( !(gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_ASSIGNED) )
00895                   {
00896                         if( gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_ELITE && ubISNumElites && ubNumElites )
00897                         {
00898                               gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
00899                               gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00900                               gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->sSectorX = SECTORX( pSectors[ ubCurrSI ] );
00901                               gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->sSectorY = SECTORY( pSectors[ ubCurrSI ] );
00902                               ubISNumElites--;
00903                               ubNumElites--;
00904                         }
00905                         else if( gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_TROOP && ubISNumTroops && ubNumTroops )
00906                         {
00907                               gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
00908                               gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00909                               gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->sSectorX = SECTORX( pSectors[ ubCurrSI ] );
00910                               gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->sSectorY = SECTORY( pSectors[ ubCurrSI ] );
00911                               ubISNumTroops--;
00912                               ubNumTroops--;
00913                         }
00914                         else if( gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_ADMIN && ubISNumAdmins && ubNumAdmins )
00915                         {
00916                               gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
00917                               gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_ASSIGNED;
00918                               gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->sSectorX = SECTORX( pSectors[ ubCurrSI ] );
00919                               gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->sSectorY = SECTORY( pSectors[ ubCurrSI ] );
00920                               ubISNumAdmins--;
00921                               ubNumAdmins--;
00922                         }
00923                   }
00924             }
00925       }
00926 
00927 }
00928 
00929 
00930 void CalculateSoldierCells( BOOLEAN fReset )
00931 {
00932       INT32 i, x, y;
00933       INT32 index, iStartY, iTop, gapStartRow;
00934       INT32 iMaxTeamSize;
00935       
00936       gpAR->ubAliveMercs = gpAR->ubMercs;
00937       gpAR->ubAliveCivs = gpAR->ubCivs;
00938       gpAR->ubAliveEnemies = gpAR->ubEnemies;
00939 
00940       //iMaxTeamSize = max( gpAR->ubMercs + gpAR->ubCivs, gpAR->ubEnemies );
00941       iMaxTeamSize = max( min( 40,  gpAR->ubMercs + gpAR->ubCivs ), min( 40,  gpAR->ubEnemies ) );
00942 
00943       
00944       if( iMaxTeamSize > 12 )
00945       {
00946             gpAR->ubTimeModifierPercentage = (UINT8)(118 - iMaxTeamSize*1.5);
00947       }
00948       else
00949       {
00950             gpAR->ubTimeModifierPercentage = 100;
00951       }
00952       gpAR->uiTimeSlice = gpAR->uiTimeSlice * gpAR->ubTimeModifierPercentage / 100;
00953       
00954       // WANNE 2
00955       iTop = iScreenHeightOffset + (240 - gpAR->sHeight/2);
00956       if( iTop > (iScreenHeightOffset + 120) )
00957             iTop -= 40;
00958 
00959       if( gpAR->ubMercs )
00960       {
00961             iStartY = iTop + (gpAR->sHeight - (min(10,gpAR->ubMercRows+gpAR->ubCivRows)*47+7))/2 + 6;
00962             //iStartY = iTop + (gpAR->sHeight - ((gpAR->ubMercRows+gpAR->ubCivRows)*47+7))/2 + 6;
00963             y = gpAR->ubMercRows;
00964             x = gpAR->ubMercCols;
00965             i = gpAR->ubMercs;
00966             gapStartRow = gpAR->ubMercRows - gpAR->ubMercRows * gpAR->ubMercCols + gpAR->ubMercs;
00967             for( x = 0; x < gpAR->ubMercCols; x++ ) for( y = 0; i && y < gpAR->ubMercRows; y++, i-- ) 
00968             {
00969                   index = y * gpAR->ubMercCols + gpAR->ubMercCols - x - 1;
00970                   if( y >= gapStartRow )
00971                         index -= y - gapStartRow + 1;
00972                   Assert( index >= 0 && index < gpAR->ubMercs );
00973 
00974                   gpMercs[ index ].xp = gpAR->sCenterStartX + 3 - 55*(x+1);
00975                   gpMercs[ index ].yp = iStartY + y*47;                 
00976                   gpMercs[ index ].uiFlags = CELL_MERC;
00977                   if( AM_AN_EPC( gpMercs[ index ].pSoldier ) )
00978                   {
00979                         if( AM_A_ROBOT( gpMercs[ index ].pSoldier ) )
00980                         { //treat robot as a merc for the purpose of combat.
00981                               gpMercs[ index ].uiFlags |= CELL_ROBOT;
00982                         }
00983                         else
00984                         {
00985                               gpMercs[ index ].uiFlags |= CELL_EPC;
00986                         }
00987                   }
00988                   gpMercs[ index ].pRegion = (MOUSE_REGION*)MemAlloc( sizeof( MOUSE_REGION ) );
00989                   Assert( gpMercs[ index ].pRegion );
00990                   memset( gpMercs[ index ].pRegion, 0, sizeof( MOUSE_REGION ) );
00991                   MSYS_DefineRegion( gpMercs[ index ].pRegion, gpMercs[ index ].xp, gpMercs[ index ].yp, 
00992                         (UINT16)(gpMercs[ index ].xp + 50), (UINT16)(gpMercs[ index ].yp + 44), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, 0,
00993                         MercCellMouseMoveCallback, MercCellMouseClickCallback );
00994                   if( fReset )
00995                         RefreshMerc( gpMercs[ index ].pSoldier );
00996                   if( !gpMercs[ index ].pSoldier->bLife )
00997                         gpAR->ubAliveMercs--;
00998             }
00999       }
01000       if( gpAR->ubCivs )
01001       {
01002             iStartY = iTop + (gpAR->sHeight - (min(10,gpAR->ubMercRows+gpAR->ubCivRows)*47+7))/2 + gpAR->ubMercRows*47 + 5;
01003             y = gpAR->ubCivRows;
01004             x = gpAR->ubCivCols;
01005             i = gpAR->ubCivs;
01006 
01007             for( index = 0; index < gpAR->ubCivs ; ++index )
01008             {
01009                   x = gpAR->ubCivCols - 1  - index % gpAR->ubCivCols;
01010                   y = index / gpAR->ubCivCols;
01011 
01012                   gpCivs[ index ].xp = gpAR->sCenterStartX + 3 - 55*(x+1);
01013                   gpCivs[ index ].yp = iStartY + y*47;
01014                   gpCivs[ index ].uiFlags |= CELL_MILITIA;
01015             }
01016       }
01017       if( gpAR->ubEnemies )
01018       {
01019             iStartY = iTop + (gpAR->sHeight - (min(10,gpAR->ubEnemyRows)*47+7))/2 + 5;
01020             y = gpAR->ubEnemyRows;
01021             x = gpAR->ubEnemyCols;
01022             i = gpAR->ubEnemies;
01023 
01024             for( index = 0; index < gpAR->ubEnemies ; ++index )
01025             {
01026                   x = index % gpAR->ubEnemyCols;
01027                   y = index / gpAR->ubEnemyCols;
01028 
01029                   gpEnemies[ index ].xp = (UINT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX + 141 + 55*x);
01030                   gpEnemies[ index ].yp = iStartY + y*47;
01031 
01032                   if( gubEnemyEncounterCode != CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
01033                   {
01034                         if( index < gpAR->ubElites )
01035                               gpEnemies[ index ].uiFlags = CELL_ELITE;
01036                         else if( index < gpAR->ubElites + gpAR->ubTroops )
01037                               gpEnemies[ index ].uiFlags = CELL_TROOP;
01038                         else
01039                               gpEnemies[ index ].uiFlags = CELL_ADMIN;
01040                   }
01041                   else
01042                   {
01043                         if( index < gpAR->ubAFCreatures )
01044                               gpEnemies[ index ].uiFlags = CELL_AF_CREATURE;
01045                         else if( index < gpAR->ubAMCreatures + gpAR->ubAFCreatures )
01046                               gpEnemies[ index ].uiFlags = CELL_AM_CREATURE;
01047                         else if( index < gpAR->ubYFCreatures + gpAR->ubAMCreatures + gpAR->ubAFCreatures )
01048                               gpEnemies[ index ].uiFlags = CELL_YF_CREATURE;
01049                         else
01050                               gpEnemies[ index ].uiFlags = CELL_YM_CREATURE;
01051                   }
01052             }
01053       }
01054 }
01055 
01056 
01057 INT32 DetermineCellID( SOLDIERCELL *pCell )
01058 {
01059       INT32 iIndex;
01060 
01061       if( pCell->pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
01062       {
01063             for( iIndex = 0 ; iIndex < gpAR->ubEnemies ; iIndex++ )
01064                   if(   &gpEnemies[ iIndex ] == pCell )
01065                         return iIndex;
01066       }else if( pCell->pSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM )
01067       {
01068             for( iIndex = 0 ; iIndex < gpAR->ubCivs ; iIndex++ )
01069                   if(   &gpCivs[ iIndex ] == pCell )
01070                         return iIndex;
01071       }
01072       
01073       return 0;
01074 }
01075 
01076 BOOLEAN IsItAllowedToRender( SOLDIERCELL *pCell )
01077 {
01078       INT32 iID = DetermineCellID( pCell );
01079 
01080       switch( pCell->pSoldier->bTeam )
01081       {
01082       case ENEMY_TEAM:
01083             if( iID >= giMaxEnemiesToRender ) return FALSE;
01084             break;
01085       case MILITIA_TEAM:
01086             if( iID >= giMaxMilitiaToRender ) return FALSE;
01087             break;
01088       }
01089       return TRUE;
01090 }
01091 
01092 
01093 void RenderSoldierCell( SOLDIERCELL *pCell )
01094 {
01095       UINT8 x;
01096 
01097       if( !IsItAllowedToRender( pCell ) ) return;
01098 
01099       if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
01100       {
01101             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+36, pCell->yp+2, pCell->xp+44,   pCell->yp+30, 0 );
01102             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, gpAR->iPanelImages, MERC_PANEL, pCell->xp, pCell->yp, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01103             RenderSoldierCellBars( pCell );
01104             x = 0;
01105       }
01106       else
01107       {
01108             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, gpAR->iPanelImages, OTHER_PANEL, pCell->xp, pCell->yp, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01109             x = 6;
01110       }
01111       if( !pCell->pSoldier->bLife )
01112       {
01113             SetObjectHandleShade( pCell->uiVObjectID, 0 );
01114             if( !(pCell->uiFlags & CELL_CREATURE) )
01115                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, gpAR->iFaces, HUMAN_SKULL, pCell->xp+3+x, pCell->yp+3, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01116             else
01117                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, gpAR->iFaces, CREATURE_SKULL, pCell->xp+3 + x, pCell->yp+3, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01118       }
01119       else
01120       {
01121             if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_HITBYATTACKER )
01122             {
01123                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+3+x, pCell->yp+3, pCell->xp+33+x,      pCell->yp+29, 65535 );
01124             }
01125             else if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_HITLASTFRAME )
01126             {
01127                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+3+x, pCell->yp+3, pCell->xp+33+x,      pCell->yp+29, 0 );
01128                   SetObjectHandleShade( pCell->uiVObjectID, 1 );
01129                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->uiVObjectID, pCell->usIndex, pCell->xp+3+x, pCell->yp+3, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01130             }
01131             else
01132             {
01133                   SetObjectHandleShade( pCell->uiVObjectID, 0 );
01134                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->uiVObjectID, pCell->usIndex, pCell->xp+3+x, pCell->yp+3, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01135             }
01136       }
01137       
01138       if( pCell->pSoldier->bLife > 0 && pCell->pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE && !(pCell->uiFlags & (CELL_HITBYATTACKER|CELL_HITLASTFRAME|CELL_CREATURE)) )
01139       { //Merc is unconcious (and not taking damage), so darken his portrait.
01140             UINT8 *pDestBuf;
01141             UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
01142             SGPRect ClipRect;
01143             ClipRect.iLeft = pCell->xp+3+x;
01144             ClipRect.iTop = pCell->yp+3;
01145             ClipRect.iRight = pCell->xp+33+x;
01146             ClipRect.iBottom = pCell->yp+29;
01147             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01148             Blt16BPPBufferShadowRect( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &ClipRect );
01149             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01150       }
01151 
01152       //Draw the health text
01153       RenderSoldierCellHealth( pCell );
01154 
01155       DrawDebugText( pCell );
01156 
01157       if( !(pCell->uiFlags & CELL_RETREATING) )
01158             pCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_DIRTY;
01159 
01160       InvalidateRegion( pCell->xp, pCell->yp, pCell->xp+50, pCell->yp+44 );
01161 
01162       //Adjust flags accordingly
01163       if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_HITBYATTACKER )
01164       {
01165             pCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_HITBYATTACKER;
01166             pCell->uiFlags |= CELL_HITLASTFRAME | CELL_DIRTY;
01167             pCell->uiFlashTime = GetJA2Clock() + 150;
01168       }
01169       else if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_HITLASTFRAME )
01170       {
01171             if( pCell->uiFlashTime < GetJA2Clock() )
01172             {
01173                   pCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_HITLASTFRAME;
01174             }
01175             pCell->uiFlags |= CELL_DIRTY;
01176       }
01177 }
01178 
01179 void RenderSoldierCellBars( SOLDIERCELL *pCell )
01180 {
01181       INT32 iStartY;
01182       //HEALTH BAR
01183       if( !pCell->pSoldier->bLife )
01184             return;
01185       //yellow one for bleeding
01186       iStartY = pCell->yp + 29 - 25*pCell->pSoldier->bLifeMax/100;
01187       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+37, iStartY, pCell->xp+38, pCell->yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 107, 107, 57 ) ) );
01188       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+38, iStartY, pCell->xp+39, pCell->yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 222, 181, 115 ) ) );
01189       //pink one for bandaged.
01190       iStartY += 25*pCell->pSoldier->bBleeding/100;
01191       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+37, iStartY, pCell->xp+38, pCell->yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 156, 57, 57 ) ) );
01192       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+38, iStartY, pCell->xp+39, pCell->yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 222, 132, 132 ) ) );
01193       //red one for actual health
01194       iStartY = pCell->yp + 29 - 25*pCell->pSoldier->bLife/100;
01195       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+37, iStartY, pCell->xp+38, pCell->yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 107, 8, 8 ) ) );
01196       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+38, iStartY, pCell->xp+39, pCell->yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 206, 0, 0 ) ) );
01197       //BREATH BAR
01198       iStartY = pCell->yp + 29 - 25*pCell->pSoldier->bBreathMax/100;
01199       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+41, iStartY, pCell->xp+42, pCell->yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 8, 132 ) ) );
01200       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+42, iStartY, pCell->xp+43, pCell->yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 8, 107 ) ) );
01201       //MORALE BAR
01202       iStartY = pCell->yp + 29 - 25*pCell->pSoldier->bMorale/100;
01203       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+45, iStartY, pCell->xp+46, pCell->yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 156, 8 ) ) );
01204       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, pCell->xp+46, iStartY, pCell->xp+47, pCell->yp+29, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 8, 107, 8 ) ) );
01205 }
01206 
01207 void BuildInterfaceBuffer()
01208 {
01209       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
01210       UINT16                              usUselessWidth, usUselessHeight;
01211       UINT8                               ubBitDepth;
01212       SGPRect                             ClipRect;
01213       SGPRect                             DestRect;
01214       INT32                               x,y;
01215 
01216       //Setup the blitting clip regions, so we don't draw outside of the region (for excess panelling)
01217       // WANNE 2
01218       gpAR->Rect.iLeft        = iScreenWidthOffset + (320 - gpAR->sWidth/2);
01219       gpAR->Rect.iRight       = gpAR->Rect.iLeft + gpAR->sWidth;
01220       gpAR->Rect.iTop               = iScreenHeightOffset + (240 - gpAR->sHeight/2);
01221       if( gpAR->Rect.iTop > (iScreenHeightOffset + 120) )
01222             gpAR->Rect.iTop -= 40;
01223       gpAR->Rect.iBottom      = gpAR->Rect.iTop + gpAR->sHeight;
01224 
01225       DestRect.iLeft                = 0;
01226       DestRect.iTop                 = 0;
01227       DestRect.iRight               = gpAR->sWidth;
01228       DestRect.iBottom        = gpAR->sHeight;
01229 
01230       //create buffer for the transition slot for merc items.  This slot contains the newly
01231       //selected item graphic in it's inventory size version.  This buffer is then scaled down
01232       //into the associated merc inventory panel slot buffer which is approximately 20% smaller.
01233       GetCurrentVideoSettings( &usUselessWidth, &usUselessHeight, &ubBitDepth );
01234       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
01235       vs_desc.usWidth = gpAR->sWidth;
01236       vs_desc.usHeight = gpAR->sHeight;
01237       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = ubBitDepth;
01238       if( !AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, (UINT32 *)&gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer ) )
01239             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to allocate memory for autoresolve interface buffer." );
01240 
01241       GetClippingRect( &ClipRect );
01242       SetClippingRect( &DestRect );
01243 
01244       //Blit the back panels...
01245       for( y = DestRect.iTop; y < DestRect.iBottom; y += 40 )
01246       {
01247             for( x = DestRect.iLeft; x < DestRect.iRight; x += 50 )
01248             {
01249                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, C_TEXTURE, x, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, 0 );
01250             }
01251       }
01252       //Blit the left and right edges
01253       for( y = DestRect.iTop; y < DestRect.iBottom; y += 40 )
01254       {
01255             x = DestRect.iLeft;
01256             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, L_BORDER, x, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, 0 );
01257             x = DestRect.iRight - 3;
01258             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, R_BORDER, x, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, 0 );
01259       }
01260       //Blit the top and bottom edges
01261       for( x = DestRect.iLeft; x < DestRect.iRight; x += 50 )
01262       {
01263             y = DestRect.iTop;
01264             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, T_BORDER, x, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, 0 );
01265             y = DestRect.iBottom - 3;
01266             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, B_BORDER, x, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, 0 );
01267       }
01268       //Blit the 4 corners
01269       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, TL_BORDER, DestRect.iLeft, DestRect.iTop, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01270       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, TR_BORDER, DestRect.iRight-10, DestRect.iTop, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01271       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, BL_BORDER, DestRect.iLeft, DestRect.iBottom-9, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01272       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, BR_BORDER, DestRect.iRight-10, DestRect.iBottom-9, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01273 
01274       //Blit the center pieces
01275       x = gpAR->sCenterStartX - gpAR->Rect.iLeft;
01276       y = 0;
01277       //Top
01278       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, TOP_MIDDLE, x, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01279       //Middle
01280       for( y = 40; y < gpAR->sHeight - 40; y += 40 )
01281       {
01282             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, AUTO_MIDDLE, x, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01283       }
01284       y = gpAR->sHeight - 40;
01285       BltVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, gpAR->iPanelImages, BOT_MIDDLE, x, y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01286 
01287       SetClippingRect( &ClipRect );
01288 }
01289 
01290 void ExpandWindow()
01291 {
01292       SGPRect OldRect;
01293       UINT32      uiDestPitchBYTES;
01294       UINT32 uiCurrentTime, uiTimeRange, uiPercent;
01295       UINT8       *pDestBuf;
01296       INT32 i;
01297 
01298       if( !gpAR->ExRect.iLeft && !gpAR->ExRect.iRight )
01299       { //First time
01300             gpAR->ExRect.iLeft = ORIG_LEFT;
01301             gpAR->ExRect.iTop = ORIG_TOP;
01302             gpAR->ExRect.iRight = ORIG_RIGHT;
01303             gpAR->ExRect.iBottom = ORIG_BOTTOM;
01304             gpAR->uiStartExpanding = GetJA2Clock();
01305             gpAR->uiEndExpanding = gpAR->uiStartExpanding + 333;
01306             for( i = 0; i < DONEWIN_BUTTON; i++ )
01307                   HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ i ] );
01308       }
01309       else
01310       {
01311             //Restore the previous area
01312             //left
01313             BlitBufferToBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, (UINT16)gpAR->ExRect.iLeft, (UINT16)gpAR->ExRect.iTop, 1, (UINT16)(gpAR->ExRect.iBottom-gpAR->ExRect.iTop+1) );
01314             InvalidateRegion( gpAR->ExRect.iLeft, gpAR->ExRect.iTop, gpAR->ExRect.iLeft+1, gpAR->ExRect.iBottom+1 );
01315             //right
01316             BlitBufferToBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, (UINT16)gpAR->ExRect.iRight, (UINT16)gpAR->ExRect.iTop, 1, (UINT16)(gpAR->ExRect.iBottom-gpAR->ExRect.iTop+1) );
01317             InvalidateRegion( gpAR->ExRect.iRight, gpAR->ExRect.iTop, gpAR->ExRect.iRight+1, gpAR->ExRect.iBottom+1 );
01318             //top
01319             BlitBufferToBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, (UINT16)gpAR->ExRect.iLeft, (UINT16)gpAR->ExRect.iTop, (UINT16)(gpAR->ExRect.iRight-gpAR->ExRect.iLeft+1), 1 );
01320             InvalidateRegion( gpAR->ExRect.iLeft, gpAR->ExRect.iTop, gpAR->ExRect.iRight+1, gpAR->ExRect.iTop+1 );
01321             //bottom
01322             BlitBufferToBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, (UINT16)gpAR->ExRect.iLeft, (UINT16)gpAR->ExRect.iBottom, (UINT16)(gpAR->ExRect.iRight-gpAR->ExRect.iLeft+1), 1 );
01323             InvalidateRegion( gpAR->ExRect.iLeft, gpAR->ExRect.iBottom, gpAR->ExRect.iRight+1, gpAR->ExRect.iBottom+1 );
01324 
01325             uiCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
01326             if( uiCurrentTime >= gpAR->uiStartExpanding && uiCurrentTime <= gpAR->uiEndExpanding )
01327             {
01328                   //Debug purposes
01329                   OldRect.iLeft = ORIG_LEFT;
01330                   OldRect.iTop = ORIG_TOP;
01331                   OldRect.iRight = ORIG_RIGHT;
01332                   OldRect.iBottom = ORIG_BOTTOM;
01333 
01334                   uiTimeRange = gpAR->uiEndExpanding - gpAR->uiStartExpanding;
01335                   uiPercent = (uiCurrentTime - gpAR->uiStartExpanding ) * 100 / uiTimeRange;
01336 
01337                   //Left
01338                   if( OldRect.iLeft <= gpAR->Rect.iLeft )
01339                         gpAR->ExRect.iLeft = OldRect.iLeft + ( gpAR->Rect.iLeft - OldRect.iLeft ) * uiPercent / 100;
01340                   else
01341                         gpAR->ExRect.iLeft = gpAR->Rect.iLeft + ( OldRect.iLeft - gpAR->Rect.iLeft ) * uiPercent / 100;
01342                   //Top
01343                   if( OldRect.iTop <= gpAR->Rect.iTop )
01344                         gpAR->ExRect.iTop = OldRect.iTop + ( gpAR->Rect.iTop - OldRect.iTop ) * uiPercent / 100;
01345                   else
01346                         gpAR->ExRect.iTop = gpAR->Rect.iTop + ( OldRect.iTop - gpAR->Rect.iTop ) * uiPercent / 100;
01347                   //Right
01348                   if( OldRect.iRight <= gpAR->Rect.iRight )
01349                         gpAR->ExRect.iRight = OldRect.iRight + ( gpAR->Rect.iRight - OldRect.iRight ) * uiPercent / 100;
01350                   else
01351                         gpAR->ExRect.iRight = gpAR->Rect.iRight + ( OldRect.iRight - gpAR->Rect.iRight ) * uiPercent / 100;
01352                   //Bottom
01353                   if( OldRect.iBottom <= gpAR->Rect.iBottom )
01354                         gpAR->ExRect.iBottom = OldRect.iBottom + ( gpAR->Rect.iBottom - OldRect.iBottom ) * uiPercent / 100;
01355                   else
01356                         gpAR->ExRect.iBottom = gpAR->Rect.iBottom + ( OldRect.iBottom - gpAR->Rect.iBottom ) * uiPercent / 100;
01357             }
01358             else
01359             { //expansion done -- final frame
01360                   gpAR->ExRect.iLeft            = gpAR->Rect.iLeft;
01361                   gpAR->ExRect.iTop             = gpAR->Rect.iTop;
01362                   gpAR->ExRect.iRight           = gpAR->Rect.iRight;
01363                   gpAR->ExRect.iBottom    = gpAR->Rect.iBottom;
01364                   gpAR->fExpanding = FALSE;
01365                   gpAR->fShowInterface = TRUE;
01366             }
01367       }
01368 
01369       //The new rect now determines the state of the current rectangle.
01370       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01371       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
01372       RectangleDraw( TRUE, gpAR->ExRect.iLeft, gpAR->ExRect.iTop, gpAR->ExRect.iRight, gpAR->ExRect.iBottom, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 200, 200, 100 ) ), pDestBuf );
01373       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01374       //left
01375       InvalidateRegion( gpAR->ExRect.iLeft, gpAR->ExRect.iTop, gpAR->ExRect.iLeft+1, gpAR->ExRect.iBottom+1 );
01376       //right
01377       InvalidateRegion( gpAR->ExRect.iRight, gpAR->ExRect.iTop, gpAR->ExRect.iRight+1, gpAR->ExRect.iBottom+1 );
01378       //top
01379       InvalidateRegion( gpAR->ExRect.iLeft, gpAR->ExRect.iTop, gpAR->ExRect.iRight+1, gpAR->ExRect.iTop+1 );
01380       //bottom
01381       InvalidateRegion( gpAR->ExRect.iLeft, gpAR->ExRect.iBottom, gpAR->ExRect.iRight+1, gpAR->ExRect.iBottom+1 );
01382 
01383 }
01384 
01385 UINT32 VirtualSoldierDressWound( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pVictim, OBJECTTYPE *pKit, INT16 sKitPts, INT16 sStatus )
01386 {
01387       UINT32 uiDressSkill, uiPossible, uiActual, uiMedcost, uiDeficiency, uiAvailAPs, uiUsedAPs;
01388       UINT8 bBelowOKlife, bPtsLeft;
01389 
01390       if( pVictim->bBleeding < 1 )
01391             return 0;         // nothing to do, shouldn't have even been called!
01392       if ( pVictim->bLife == 0 )
01393             return 0;
01394 
01395       // calculate wound-dressing skill (3x medical,  2x equip,1x level, 1x dex)
01396       uiDressSkill = ( ( 3 * EffectiveMedical( pSoldier ) ) +           // medical knowledge
01397                                                       ( 2 * sStatus) +                                                                          // state of medical kit
01398                                                       (10 * EffectiveExpLevel( pSoldier ) ) +         // battle injury experience
01399                                                       EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) )    / 7;        // general "handiness"
01400 
01401       // try to use every AP that the merc has left
01402       uiAvailAPs = pSoldier->bActionPoints;
01403 
01404       // OK, If we are in real-time, use another value...
01405       if (!(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01406       {     // Set to a value which looks good based on out tactical turns duration
01407             uiAvailAPs = RT_FIRST_AID_GAIN_MODIFIER;        
01408       }
01409 
01410       // calculate how much bandaging CAN be done this turn
01411       uiPossible = ( uiAvailAPs * uiDressSkill ) / 50;      // max rate is 2 * fullAPs
01412 
01413       // if no healing is possible (insufficient APs or insufficient dressSkill)
01414       if (!uiPossible)
01415             return 0;
01416 
01417       if (Item[pSoldier->inv[0].usItem].medicalkit )        // using the GOOD medic stuff
01418             uiPossible += ( uiPossible / 2);                // add extra 50 %
01419 
01420       uiActual = uiPossible;        // start by assuming maximum possible
01421 
01422       // figure out how far below OKLIFE the victim is
01423       if (pVictim->bLife >= OKLIFE)
01424             bBelowOKlife = 0;
01425       else
01426             bBelowOKlife = OKLIFE - pVictim->bLife;
01427 
01428       // figure out how many healing pts we need to stop dying (2x cost)
01429       uiDeficiency = (2 * bBelowOKlife );
01430 
01431       // if, after that, the patient will still be bleeding
01432       if ( (pVictim->bBleeding - bBelowOKlife ) > 0)
01433       { // then add how many healing pts we need to stop bleeding (1x cost)
01434             uiDeficiency += ( pVictim->bBleeding - bBelowOKlife );
01435       }
01436 
01437       // now, make sure we weren't going to give too much
01438       if ( uiActual > uiDeficiency) // if we were about to apply too much
01439             uiActual = uiDeficiency;      // reduce actual not to waste anything
01440 
01441       // now make sure we HAVE that much
01442       if( Item[pKit->usItem].medicalkit )
01443       {
01444             uiMedcost = uiActual / 2;           // cost is only half
01445             if ( uiMedcost == 0 && uiActual > 0)
01446                   uiMedcost = 1;
01447             if ( uiMedcost > (UINT32)sKitPts )              // if we can't afford this
01448             {
01449                   uiMedcost = sKitPts;          // what CAN we afford?
01450                   uiActual = uiMedcost * 2;           // give double this as aid
01451             }
01452       }
01453       else
01454       {
01455             uiMedcost = uiActual;
01456             if ( uiMedcost == 0 && uiActual > 0)
01457                   uiMedcost = 1;
01458             if ( uiMedcost > (UINT32)sKitPts)         // can't afford it
01459                   uiMedcost = uiActual = sKitPts;     // recalc cost AND aid
01460       }
01461             
01462       bPtsLeft = (INT8)uiActual;
01463       // heal real life points first (if below OKLIFE) because we don't want the
01464       // patient still DYING if bandages run out, or medic is disabled/distracted!
01465       // NOTE: Dressing wounds for life below OKLIFE now costs 2 pts/life point!
01466       if ( bPtsLeft && pVictim->bLife < OKLIFE)
01467       {
01468             // if we have enough points to bring him all the way to OKLIFE this turn
01469             if ( bPtsLeft >= (2 * bBelowOKlife ) )
01470             { // raise life to OKLIFE
01471                   pVictim->bLife = OKLIFE;
01472                   // reduce bleeding by the same number of life points healed up
01473                   pVictim->bBleeding -= bBelowOKlife;
01474                   // use up appropriate # of actual healing points
01475                   bPtsLeft -= (2 * bBelowOKlife);
01476             }
01477             else
01478             {
01479                   pVictim->bLife += ( bPtsLeft / 2);
01480                   pVictim->bBleeding -= ( bPtsLeft / 2);
01481                   bPtsLeft = bPtsLeft % 2;      // if ptsLeft was odd, ptsLeft = 1
01482             }
01483 
01484             // this should never happen any more, but make sure bleeding not negative
01485             if (pVictim->bBleeding < 0)
01486                   pVictim->bBleeding = 0;
01487 
01488             // if this healing brought the patient out of the worst of it, cancel dying
01489             if (pVictim->bLife >= OKLIFE )
01490             { // turn off merc QUOTE flags
01491                   pVictim->fDyingComment = FALSE;
01492             }
01493 
01494             if ( pVictim->bBleeding <= MIN_BLEEDING_THRESHOLD )
01495             {
01496                   pVictim->fWarnedAboutBleeding = FALSE;
01497             }
01498       }
01499 
01500       // if any healing points remain, apply that to any remaining bleeding (1/1)
01501       // DON'T spend any APs/kit pts to cure bleeding until merc is no longer dying
01502       //if ( bPtsLeft && pVictim->bBleeding && !pVictim->dying)
01503       if ( bPtsLeft && pVictim->bBleeding )
01504       { // if we have enough points to bandage all remaining bleeding this turn
01505             if (bPtsLeft >= pVictim->bBleeding )
01506             {
01507                   bPtsLeft -= pVictim->bBleeding;
01508                   pVictim->bBleeding = 0;
01509             }
01510             else        // bandage what we can
01511             {
01512                   pVictim->bBleeding -= bPtsLeft;
01513                   bPtsLeft = 0;
01514             }
01515       }
01516       // if there are any ptsLeft now, then we didn't actually get to use them
01517       uiActual -= bPtsLeft;
01518 
01519       // usedAPs equals (actionPts) * (%of possible points actually used)
01520       uiUsedAPs = ( uiActual * uiAvailAPs ) / uiPossible;
01521 
01522       if (Item[pSoldier->inv[0].usItem].medicalkit )  // using the GOOD medic stuff
01523             uiUsedAPs = ( uiUsedAPs * 2) / 3;   // reverse 50% bonus by taking 2/3rds
01524 
01525       if ( uiActual / 2)
01526             // MEDICAL GAIN (actual / 2):  Helped someone by giving first aid
01527             StatChange(pSoldier,MEDICALAMT,( (UINT16)(uiActual / 2) ),FALSE);
01528 
01529       if ( uiActual / 4)
01530             // DEXTERITY GAIN (actual / 4):  Helped someone by giving first aid
01531             StatChange(pSoldier,DEXTAMT,(UINT16)( ( uiActual / 4) ),FALSE);
01532 
01533       return uiMedcost;
01534 }
01535 
01536 OBJECTTYPE* FindMedicalKit()
01537 {
01538       INT32 i;
01539       INT32 iSlot;
01540       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
01541       {
01542             iSlot = FindObjClass( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier, IC_MEDKIT );
01543             if( iSlot != NO_SLOT )
01544             {
01545                   return( &gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->inv[ iSlot ] );
01546             }
01547       }
01548       return NULL;
01549 }
01550 
01551 UINT32 AutoBandageMercs()
01552 {
01553   INT32 i, iBest;
01554       UINT32 uiPointsUsed, uiCurrPointsUsed, uiMaxPointsUsed, uiParallelPointsUsed;
01555       UINT16 usKitPts;
01556       OBJECTTYPE *pKit = NULL;
01557       BOOLEAN fFound = FALSE;
01558       BOOLEAN fComplete = TRUE;
01559       INT8 bSlot, cnt;
01560 
01561       //Do we have any doctors?  If so, bandage selves first.
01562       fFound = FALSE;
01563       uiMaxPointsUsed = uiParallelPointsUsed = 0;
01564       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
01565       {
01566             if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && 
01567                     !gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bCollapsed && 
01568                         gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bMedical > 0 &&
01569                         ( bSlot = FindObjClass( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier, IC_MEDKIT ) ) != NO_SLOT )
01570             {
01571                   fFound = TRUE;
01572                   //bandage self first!
01573                   uiCurrPointsUsed = 0;
01574                   cnt = 0;
01575                   while( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bBleeding )
01576                   {
01577                         pKit = &gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->inv[ bSlot ];
01578                         usKitPts = TotalPoints( pKit );
01579                         if( !usKitPts )
01580                         { //attempt to find another kit before stopping
01581                               if( ( bSlot = FindObjClass( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier, IC_MEDKIT ) ) != NO_SLOT )
01582                                 continue;
01583                               break;
01584                         }
01585                         uiPointsUsed = VirtualSoldierDressWound( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier, gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier, pKit, usKitPts, usKitPts );
01586                         UseKitPoints( pKit, (UINT16)uiPointsUsed, gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier );
01587                         uiCurrPointsUsed += uiPointsUsed;
01588                         cnt++;
01589                         if( cnt > 50 )
01590                               break;
01591                   }
01592                   if( uiCurrPointsUsed > uiMaxPointsUsed )
01593                         uiMaxPointsUsed = uiCurrPointsUsed;
01594                   if( !pKit )
01595                         break;
01596             }
01597       }
01598 
01599 
01600       //Find the best rated doctor to do all of the bandaging.
01601       iBest = 0;
01602       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
01603       {
01604             if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bCollapsed && gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bMedical > 0 )
01605             {
01606                   if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bMedical > gpMercs[ iBest ].pSoldier->bMedical )
01607                   {
01608                         iBest = i;
01609                   }
01610             }
01611       }
01612 
01613       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
01614       {
01615             while( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bBleeding && gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife )
01616             { //This merc needs medical attention
01617                   if( !pKit )
01618                   {
01619                         pKit = FindMedicalKit();
01620                         if( !pKit )
01621                         {
01622                               fComplete = FALSE;
01623                               break;
01624                         }
01625                   }
01626                   usKitPts = TotalPoints( pKit );
01627                   if( !usKitPts )
01628                   {
01629                         pKit = NULL;
01630                         fComplete = FALSE;
01631                         continue;
01632                   }
01633                   uiPointsUsed = VirtualSoldierDressWound( gpMercs[ iBest ].pSoldier, gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier, pKit, usKitPts, usKitPts );
01634                   UseKitPoints( pKit, (UINT16)uiPointsUsed, gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier );
01635                   uiParallelPointsUsed += uiPointsUsed;
01636                   fComplete = TRUE;
01637             }
01638       }
01639       if( fComplete )
01640       {
01641             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( gzLateLocalizedString[ 13 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, AutoBandageFinishedCallback );
01642       }
01643       else
01644       {
01645             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( gzLateLocalizedString[ 10 ], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, AutoBandageFinishedCallback );
01646       }
01647 
01648       gpAR->uiTotalElapsedBattleTimeInMilliseconds += uiParallelPointsUsed * 200;
01649       return 1;
01650 }
01651 
01652 void RenderAutoResolve()
01653 {
01654       INT32 i;
01655       HVSURFACE hVSurface;
01656       INT32 xp, yp;
01657       SOLDIERCELL *pCell = NULL;
01658       INT32 index = 0;
01659       UINT16 str[100];
01660       UINT8 bTownId = 0;
01661       UINT8 ubGood, ubBad;
01662       
01663       if( gpAR->fExpanding )
01664       { //animate the expansion of the window.
01665             ExpandWindow();
01666             return;
01667       }
01668       else if( gpAR->fShowInterface )
01669       { //After expanding the window, we now show the interface
01670             if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS && !gpAR->fPendingSurrender )
01671             {
01672                   for( i = 0 ; i < DONEWIN_BUTTON; i++ )
01673                         ShowButton( gpAR->iButton[ i ] );
01674                   HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] );
01675                   HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ YES_BUTTON ] );
01676                   HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ NO_BUTTON ] );
01677                   gpAR->fShowInterface = FALSE;
01678             }
01679             else if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_VICTORY )
01680             {
01681                   ShowButton( gpAR->iButton[ DONEWIN_BUTTON ] );
01682                   ShowButton( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] );
01683             }
01684             else
01685             {
01686                   ShowButton( gpAR->iButton[ DONELOSE_BUTTON ] );
01687             }
01688       }
01689 
01690       if( !gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve && !gpAR->fDebugInfo )
01691       { //update the dirty cells only
01692             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
01693             {
01694                   if( gpMercs[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_DIRTY )
01695                   {
01696                         RenderSoldierCell( &gpMercs[ i ] );
01697                   }
01698             }
01699             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubCivs; i++ )
01700             {
01701                   if( gpCivs[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_DIRTY )
01702                   {
01703                         RenderSoldierCell( &gpCivs[ i ] );
01704                   }
01705             }
01706             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
01707             {
01708                   if( gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_DIRTY )
01709                   {
01710                         RenderSoldierCell( &gpEnemies[ i ] );
01711                   }
01712             }
01713             return;
01714       }
01715       gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve = FALSE;
01716 
01717       GetVideoSurface( &hVSurface, gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer );
01718       BltVideoSurfaceToVideoSurface( ghFrameBuffer, hVSurface, 0, gpAR->Rect.iLeft, gpAR->Rect.iTop, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, 0 );
01719 
01720       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
01721       {
01722             RenderSoldierCell( &gpMercs[ i ] );
01723       }
01724       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubCivs; i++ )
01725       {
01726             RenderSoldierCell( &gpCivs[ i ] );
01727       }
01728       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
01729       {
01730             RenderSoldierCell( &gpEnemies[ i ] );
01731       }
01732       
01733       //Render the titles
01734       SetFont( FONT10ARIALBOLD );
01735       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
01736       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
01737       
01738       switch( gubEnemyEncounterCode )
01739       {
01740             case NO_ENCOUNTER_CODE:
01741                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[STR_AR_ATTACK_HEADER] );
01742                   break;
01743             case ENEMY_ENCOUNTER_CODE:
01744                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[STR_AR_ENCOUNTER_HEADER] );
01745                   break;
01746             case ENEMY_INVASION_CODE:
01747             case CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE:
01748                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[STR_AR_DEFEND_HEADER] );
01749                   break;
01750             default: 
01751                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[STR_AR_ATTACK_HEADER] );
01752                   break;
01753       }
01754 
01755       xp = gpAR->sCenterStartX + 70 - StringPixLength( str, FONT10ARIALBOLD )/2;
01756       yp = gpAR->Rect.iTop + 15;
01757       mprintf( xp, yp, str );
01758 
01759       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
01760       SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY2 );
01761       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
01762 
01763       GetSectorIDString( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0, str, TRUE );
01764       xp = gpAR->sCenterStartX + 70 - StringPixLength( str, FONT10ARIAL )/2;
01765       yp += 11;
01766       mprintf( xp, yp, str );
01767 
01768       //Display the remaining forces
01769       ubGood = (UINT8)(gpAR->ubAliveMercs + gpAR->ubAliveCivs);
01770       ubBad = gpAR->ubAliveEnemies;
01771       swprintf( str, gzLateLocalizedString[ 17 ], ubGood, ubBad );
01772 
01773       SetFont( FONT14ARIAL );
01774       if( ubGood * 3 <= ubBad * 2 )
01775       {
01776             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED );
01777       }
01778       else if( ubGood * 2 >= ubBad * 3 )
01779       {
01780             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01781       }
01782       else 
01783       {
01784             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01785       }
01786       
01787       xp = gpAR->sCenterStartX + 70 - StringPixLength( str, FONT14ARIAL )/2;
01788       yp += 11;
01789       mprintf( xp, yp, str );
01790 
01791       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01792             if( gpAR->fAllowCapture )
01793             {
01794                   mprintf( 2, 2, L"Enemy capture enabled." );
01795             }
01796       #endif
01797 
01798       if( gpAR->fPendingSurrender )
01799       {
01800             // WANNE 2
01801             DisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+16), (UINT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 230+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), 108, 2,
01802                   (UINT8)FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, gpStrategicString[ STR_ENEMY_SURRENDER_OFFER ], FONT_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01803       }
01804       
01805       if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus != BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS )
01806       {
01807             // Handle merc morale, Global loyalty, and change of sector control
01808             if( !gpAR->fMoraleEventsHandled )
01809             {
01810                   gpAR->uiTotalElapsedBattleTimeInMilliseconds *= 3;
01811                   gpAR->fMoraleEventsHandled = TRUE;
01812                   if ( CheckFact( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_FOUGHT, 0 ) == FALSE )
01813                   {
01814                         // this was the first battle against the army
01815                         SetFactTrue( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_FOUGHT );
01816                         if ( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_VICTORY)
01817                         {
01818                               SetFactTrue( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_WON );
01819                         }
01820                         SetTheFirstBattleSector( ( INT16 ) (gpAR->ubSectorX + gpAR->ubSectorY * MAP_WORLD_X ) );
01821                         HandleFirstBattleEndingWhileInTown( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0, TRUE );
01822                   }
01823 
01824                   switch( gpAR->ubBattleStatus )
01825                   {
01826                         case BATTLE_VICTORY:
01827                               HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_BATTLE_WON, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 );
01828                               if( ProcessLoyalty() )HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_BATTLE_WON, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 );
01829 
01830                               SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY ) ].bLastKnownEnemies = 0;                       
01831                               SetThisSectorAsPlayerControlled( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0, TRUE );
01832 
01833                               SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_VICTORY );
01834                               LogBattleResults( LOG_VICTORY );
01835                               break;
01836 
01837                         case BATTLE_SURRENDERED:
01838                         case BATTLE_CAPTURED:
01839                               for( i = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID; i <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; i++ )
01840                               {
01841                                     if( MercPtrs[ i ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ i ]->bLife && !(MercPtrs[ i ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) && !AM_A_ROBOT( MercPtrs[ i ] ) )
01842                                     { //Merc is active and alive, and not a vehicle or robot
01843                                           if ( PlayerMercInvolvedInThisCombat( MercPtrs[ i ] ) )
01844                                           {
01845                                                 // This morale event is PER INDIVIDUAL SOLDIER
01846                                                 HandleMoraleEvent( MercPtrs[ i ], MORALE_MERC_CAPTURED, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 );
01847                                           }
01848                                     }
01849                               }
01850                               HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_HEARD_BATTLE_LOST, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 );
01851                               if( ProcessLoyalty() )HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_BATTLE_LOST, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 );
01852 
01853                               SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_DEATH );
01854                               gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID = (INT16)SECTOR( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
01855                               break;
01856                         case BATTLE_DEFEAT:
01857                               HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_HEARD_BATTLE_LOST, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 );
01858                               if( ProcessLoyalty() )HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_BATTLE_LOST, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 );
01859                               if( gubEnemyEncounterCode != CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
01860                               {
01861                                     gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID = (INT16)SECTOR( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
01862                               }
01863                               else
01864                               {
01865                                     gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID = (INT16)SECTOR( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
01866                                     gsCiviliansEatenByMonsters = gpAR->ubAliveEnemies;
01867                               }
01868                               SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_DEATH );
01869                               LogBattleResults( LOG_DEFEAT );
01870                               break;
01871 
01872                         case BATTLE_RETREAT:
01873                               
01874                               //Tack on 5 minutes for retreat.
01875                               gpAR->uiTotalElapsedBattleTimeInMilliseconds += 300000;
01876 
01877                               if( ProcessLoyalty() )HandleLoyaltyImplicationsOfMercRetreat( RETREAT_AUTORESOLVE, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 );
01878                               if( gubEnemyEncounterCode != CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
01879                               {
01880                                     gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID = (INT16)SECTOR( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
01881                               }
01882                               else if( gpAR->ubAliveEnemies )
01883                               {
01884                                     gsEnemyGainedControlOfSectorID = (INT16)SECTOR( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
01885                                     gsCiviliansEatenByMonsters = gpAR->ubAliveEnemies;
01886                               }
01887                               break;
01888                   }
01889             }
01890             //Render the end battle condition.
01891                   switch( gpAR->ubBattleStatus )
01892                   {
01893                         case BATTLE_VICTORY:
01894                               SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
01895                               swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_OVER_VICTORY ] );
01896                               break;
01897                         case BATTLE_SURRENDERED:
01898                         case BATTLE_CAPTURED:
01899                               if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_SURRENDERED )
01900                               {
01901                                     swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_OVER_SURRENDERED ] );
01902                               }
01903                               else
01904                               {
01905                                     DisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+16), iScreenHeightOffset + 310, 108, 2,
01906                                           FONT10ARIAL, FONT_YELLOW, gpStrategicString[ STR_ENEMY_CAPTURED ], FONT_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01907                                     swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_OVER_CAPTURED ] );
01908                               }
01909                               SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01910                               break;
01911                         case BATTLE_DEFEAT:
01912                               SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01913                               swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_OVER_DEFEAT ] );
01914                               break;
01915                         case BATTLE_RETREAT:
01916                               SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01917                               swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_OVER_RETREATED ] );
01918                               break;
01919                   }
01920                   //Render the results of the battle.
01921                   // WANNE 2
01922                   SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
01923                   xp = gpAR->sCenterStartX + 12;
01924                   yp = iScreenHeightOffset + 218 + gpAR->bVerticalOffset;
01925                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, gpAR->iIndent, 0, xp, yp, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01926                   xp = gpAR->sCenterStartX + 70 - StringPixLength( str, BLOCKFONT2 )/2;
01927                   yp = iScreenHeightOffset + 227 + gpAR->bVerticalOffset;
01928                   mprintf( xp, yp, str );
01929 
01930                   //Render the total battle time elapsed.
01931                   SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
01932                   swprintf( str, L"%s:  %dm %02ds", 
01933                         gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_TIME_ELAPSED ],
01934                         gpAR->uiTotalElapsedBattleTimeInMilliseconds/60000,
01935                         (gpAR->uiTotalElapsedBattleTimeInMilliseconds%60000)/1000 );
01936                   xp = gpAR->sCenterStartX + 70 - StringPixLength( str, FONT10ARIAL )/2;
01937                   // WANNE 2
01938                   yp = iScreenHeightOffset + 290 + gpAR->bVerticalOffset;
01939                   SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01940                   mprintf( xp, yp, str );
01941       }
01942 
01943       MarkButtonsDirty();
01944       InvalidateScreen();
01945 }
01946 
01947 void CreateAutoResolveInterface()
01948 {
01949       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
01950       INT32 i, index;
01951       HVOBJECT hVObject;
01952       UINT8 ubGreenMilitia, ubRegMilitia, ubEliteMilitia;
01953       //Setup new autoresolve blanket interface.
01954       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gpAR->AutoResolveRegion, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH-1, 0,
01955             MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK );
01956       gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve = TRUE;
01957       gpAR->fExitAutoResolve = FALSE;
01958 
01959       //Load the general panel image pieces, to be combined to make the dynamically sized window.
01960       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01961       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Interface\\AutoResolve.sti" );
01962       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&gpAR->iPanelImages ) )
01963       {
01964             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\AutoResolve.sti" );
01965       }
01966 
01967       //Load the button images file, and assign it to the first button.
01968       /* OLD BEFORE THE MEDICAL BUTTON WAS ADDED
01969       gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] = LoadButtonImage( "Interface\\AutoBtns.sti", -1, 0, -1, 6, -1 );
01970       if( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] == -1 )
01971       {
01972             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\AutoBtns.sti" );
01973       }
01974 
01975       //Have the other buttons hook into the first button containing the images.
01976       gpAR->iButtonImage[ PLAY_BUTTON ]               = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 1, -1, 7, -1 );
01977       gpAR->iButtonImage[ FAST_BUTTON ]               = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 2, -1, 8, -1 );
01978       gpAR->iButtonImage[ FINISH_BUTTON ]       = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 3, -1, 9, -1 );
01979       gpAR->iButtonImage[ YES_BUTTON ]                = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 4, -1, 10, -1 );
