01980       gpAR->iButtonImage[ NO_BUTTON ]                       = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 5, -1, 11, -1 );
01981       gpAR->iButtonImage[ RETREAT_BUTTON ]      = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 12, -1, 13, -1 );
01982       gpAR->iButtonImage[ DONE_BUTTON ]               = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 14, -1, 15, -1 );
01983       */
01984       gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] = LoadButtonImage( "Interface\\AutoBtns.sti", -1, 0, -1, 7, -1 );
01985       if( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] == -1 )
01986       {
01987             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\AutoBtns.sti" );
01988       }
01989 
01990       //Have the other buttons hook into the first button containing the images.
01991       gpAR->iButtonImage[ PLAY_BUTTON ]               = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 1, -1, 8, -1 );
01992       gpAR->iButtonImage[ FAST_BUTTON ]               = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 2, -1, 9, -1 );
01993       gpAR->iButtonImage[ FINISH_BUTTON ]       = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 3, -1, 10, -1 );
01994       gpAR->iButtonImage[ YES_BUTTON ]                = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 4, -1, 11, -1 );
01995       gpAR->iButtonImage[ NO_BUTTON ]                       = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 5, -1, 12, -1 );
01996       gpAR->iButtonImage[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ]      = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 6, -1, 13, -1 );
01997       gpAR->iButtonImage[ RETREAT_BUTTON ]      = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 14, -1, 15, -1 );
01998       gpAR->iButtonImage[ DONEWIN_BUTTON ]      = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 14, -1, 15, -1 );
01999       gpAR->iButtonImage[ DONELOSE_BUTTON ]     = UseLoadedButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ], -1, 16, -1, 17, -1 );
02000 
02001       //Load the generic faces for civs and enemies
02002       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Interface\\SmFaces.sti" );
02003       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&gpAR->iFaces ) )
02004       {
02005             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\SmFaces.sti" );
02006       }
02007       if( GetVideoObject( &hVObject, gpAR->iFaces ) )
02008       {
02009             hVObject->pShades[ 0 ] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 255, 255, 255, FALSE );
02010             hVObject->pShades[ 1 ] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 250, 25, 25, TRUE );
02011       }
02012 
02013       //Add the battle over panels 
02014       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Interface\\indent.sti" );
02015       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&gpAR->iIndent ) )
02016       {
02017             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to load Interface\\indent.sti" );
02018       }
02019 
02020       //add all the faces now
02021       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
02022       {
02023             VOBJECT_DESC VObjectDesc;
02024             //Load the face
02025             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02026             sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\%02d.sti", gMercProfiles[ gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex );
02027             if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &gpMercs[ i ].uiVObjectID ) )
02028             {
02029                   sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "Faces\\65Face\\speck.sti" );
02030                   if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &gpMercs[ i ].uiVObjectID ) )
02031                   {
02032                         AssertMsg( 0, String("Failed to load %Faces\\65Face\\%02d.sti or it's placeholder, speck.sti", gMercProfiles[ gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubFaceIndex) );
02033                   }
02034             }
02035             if( GetVideoObject( &hVObject, gpMercs[ i ].uiVObjectID ) )
02036             {
02037                   hVObject->pShades[ 0 ] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 255, 255, 255, FALSE );
02038                   hVObject->pShades[ 1 ] = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hVObject->pPaletteEntry, 250, 25, 25, TRUE );
02039             }
02040       }
02041 
02042       ubEliteMilitia = MilitiaInFiveSectorsOfRank( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, ELITE_MILITIA );
02043       ubRegMilitia = MilitiaInFiveSectorsOfRank( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, REGULAR_MILITIA );
02044       ubGreenMilitia = MilitiaInFiveSectorsOfRank( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, GREEN_MILITIA );
02045       while( ubEliteMilitia + ubRegMilitia + ubGreenMilitia < gpAR->ubCivs )
02046       {
02047             switch( PreRandom( 3 ) )
02048             {
02049                   case 0: ubEliteMilitia++;     break;
02050                   case 1:     ubRegMilitia++;         break;
02051                   case 2:     ubGreenMilitia++; break;
02052             }
02053       }
02054       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubCivs; i++ )
02055       {
02056             // reset counter of how many mortars this team has rolled
02057             ResetMortarsOnTeamCount();
02058 
02059             if( i < ubEliteMilitia )
02060             {
02061                   gpCivs[i].pSoldier = TacticalCreateMilitia( SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE_MILITIA );
02062                   if( gpCivs[i].pSoldier->ubBodyType == REGFEMALE )
02063                   {
02064                         gpCivs[i].usIndex = MILITIA3F_FACE;
02065                   }
02066                   else
02067                   {
02068                         gpCivs[i].usIndex = MILITIA3_FACE;
02069                   }
02070             }
02071             else if( i < ubRegMilitia + ubEliteMilitia )
02072             {
02073                   gpCivs[i].pSoldier = TacticalCreateMilitia( SOLDIER_CLASS_REG_MILITIA );
02074                   if( gpCivs[i].pSoldier->ubBodyType == REGFEMALE )
02075                   {
02076                         gpCivs[i].usIndex = MILITIA2F_FACE;
02077                   }
02078                   else
02079                   {
02080                         gpCivs[i].usIndex = MILITIA2_FACE;
02081                   }
02082             }
02083             else if( i < ubGreenMilitia + ubRegMilitia + ubEliteMilitia )
02084             {
02085                   gpCivs[i].pSoldier = TacticalCreateMilitia( SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA );
02086                   if( gpCivs[i].pSoldier->ubBodyType == REGFEMALE )
02087                   {
02088                         gpCivs[i].usIndex = MILITIA1F_FACE;
02089                   }
02090                   else
02091                   {
02092                         gpCivs[i].usIndex = MILITIA1_FACE;
02093                   }
02094             }
02095             else
02096             {
02097                   AssertMsg( 0, "Attempting to illegally create a militia soldier." );
02098             }
02099             if( !gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier )
02100             {
02101                   AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to create militia soldier for autoresolve." );
02102             }
02103             gpCivs[i].uiVObjectID = gpAR->iFaces;
02104             gpCivs[i].pSoldier->sSectorX = gpAR->ubSectorX;
02105             gpCivs[i].pSoldier->sSectorY = gpAR->ubSectorY;
02106             swprintf( gpCivs[i].pSoldier->name, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_MILITIA_NAME ] );
02107       }
02108       if( gubEnemyEncounterCode != CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
02109       {
02110             for( i = 0, index = 0; i < gpAR->ubElites; i++, index++ )
02111             {
02112                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier = TacticalCreateEliteEnemy();
02113                   gpEnemies[index].uiVObjectID = gpAR->iFaces;
02114                   if( gpEnemies[i].pSoldier->ubBodyType == REGFEMALE )
02115                   {
02116                         gpEnemies[index].usIndex = ELITEF_FACE;
02117                   }
02118                   else
02119                   {
02120                         gpEnemies[index].usIndex = ELITE_FACE;
02121                   }
02122                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorX = gpAR->ubSectorX;
02123                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorY = gpAR->ubSectorY;
02124                   swprintf( gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->name, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_ELITE_NAME ] );
02125             }
02126             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubTroops; i++, index++ )
02127             {
02128                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier = TacticalCreateArmyTroop();
02129                   gpEnemies[index].uiVObjectID = gpAR->iFaces;
02130                   gpEnemies[index].usIndex = TROOP_FACE;
02131                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorX = gpAR->ubSectorX;
02132                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorY = gpAR->ubSectorY;
02133                   swprintf( gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->name, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_TROOP_NAME ] );
02134             }
02135             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubAdmins; i++, index++ )
02136             {
02137                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier = TacticalCreateAdministrator();
02138                   gpEnemies[index].uiVObjectID = gpAR->iFaces;
02139                   gpEnemies[index].usIndex = ADMIN_FACE;
02140                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorX = gpAR->ubSectorX;
02141                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorY = gpAR->ubSectorY;
02142                   swprintf( gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->name, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_ADMINISTRATOR_NAME ] );
02143             }
02144             AssociateEnemiesWithStrategicGroups();
02145       }
02146       else
02147       {
02148             for( i = 0, index = 0; i < gpAR->ubAFCreatures; i++, index++ )
02149             {
02150                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier = TacticalCreateCreature( ADULTFEMALEMONSTER );
02151                   gpEnemies[index].uiVObjectID = gpAR->iFaces;
02152                   gpEnemies[index].usIndex = AF_CREATURE_FACE;
02153                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorX = gpAR->ubSectorX;
02154                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorY = gpAR->ubSectorY;
02155                   swprintf( gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->name, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_CREATURE_NAME ] );
02156             }
02157             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubAMCreatures; i++, index++ )
02158             {
02159                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier = TacticalCreateCreature( AM_MONSTER );
02160                   gpEnemies[index].uiVObjectID = gpAR->iFaces;
02161                   gpEnemies[index].usIndex = AM_CREATURE_FACE;
02162                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorX = gpAR->ubSectorX;
02163                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorY = gpAR->ubSectorY;
02164                   swprintf( gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->name, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_CREATURE_NAME ] );
02165             }
02166             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubYFCreatures; i++, index++ )
02167             {
02168                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier = TacticalCreateCreature( YAF_MONSTER );
02169                   gpEnemies[index].uiVObjectID = gpAR->iFaces;
02170                   gpEnemies[index].usIndex = YF_CREATURE_FACE;
02171                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorX = gpAR->ubSectorX;
02172                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorY = gpAR->ubSectorY;
02173                   swprintf( gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->name, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_CREATURE_NAME ] );
02174             }
02175             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubYMCreatures; i++, index++ )
02176             {
02177                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier = TacticalCreateCreature( YAM_MONSTER );
02178                   gpEnemies[index].uiVObjectID = gpAR->iFaces;
02179                   gpEnemies[index].usIndex = YM_CREATURE_FACE;
02180                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorX = gpAR->ubSectorX;
02181                   gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->sSectorY = gpAR->ubSectorY;
02182                   swprintf( gpEnemies[index].pSoldier->name, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_CREATURE_NAME ] );
02183             }
02184       }
02185 
02186       if( gpAR->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && gpAR->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY && !gbWorldSectorZ )
02187       {
02188             CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld();
02189       }
02190       else
02191       {
02192             gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;
02193       }
02194 
02195       //Build the interface buffer, and blit the "shaded" background.  This info won't
02196       //change from now on, but will be used to restore text.
02197       BuildInterfaceBuffer();
02198       BlitBufferToBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
02199 
02200       //If we are bumping up the interface, then also use that piece of info to
02201       //move the buttons up by the same amount.
02202 
02203       gpAR->bVerticalOffset = (240 - gpAR->sHeight/2) > 120 ? -40 : 0;
02204       
02205       // WANNE 2
02206       //Create the buttons -- subject to relocation
02207       gpAR->iButton[ PLAY_BUTTON ] = 
02208             QuickCreateButton( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PLAY_BUTTON ] , (INT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+11), (INT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 240+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02209             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, PlayButtonCallback );
02210       gpAR->iButton[ FAST_BUTTON ] = 
02211             QuickCreateButton( gpAR->iButtonImage[ FAST_BUTTON ] , (INT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+51), (INT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 240+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02212             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, FastButtonCallback );
02213       gpAR->iButton[ FINISH_BUTTON ] = 
02214             QuickCreateButton( gpAR->iButtonImage[ FINISH_BUTTON ] , (INT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+91), (INT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 240+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02215             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, FinishButtonCallback );
02216       gpAR->iButton[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] = 
02217             QuickCreateButton( gpAR->iButtonImage[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] , (INT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+11), (INT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 274+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02218             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, PauseButtonCallback );
02219       
02220       gpAR->iButton[ RETREAT_BUTTON ] = 
02221             QuickCreateButton( gpAR->iButtonImage[ RETREAT_BUTTON ], (INT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+51), (INT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 274+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02222             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, RetreatButtonCallback );
02223       if( !gpAR->ubMercs )
02224       {
02225             DisableButton( gpAR->iButton[ RETREAT_BUTTON ] );
02226       }
02227       SpecifyGeneralButtonTextAttributes( gpAR->iButton[ RETREAT_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[STR_AR_RETREAT_BUTTON], BLOCKFONT2, 169, FONT_NEARBLACK );
02228 
02229       gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] = 
02230             QuickCreateButton( gpAR->iButtonImage[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] , (INT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+11), (INT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 245+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), BUTTON_NO_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02231             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BandageButtonCallback );
02232 
02233       gpAR->iButton[ DONEWIN_BUTTON ] = 
02234             QuickCreateButton( gpAR->iButtonImage[ DONEWIN_BUTTON ], (INT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+51), (INT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 245+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02235             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, DoneButtonCallback );
02236       SpecifyGeneralButtonTextAttributes( gpAR->iButton[ DONEWIN_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[STR_AR_DONE_BUTTON], BLOCKFONT2, 169, FONT_NEARBLACK );
02237 
02238       gpAR->iButton[ DONELOSE_BUTTON ] = 
02239             QuickCreateButton( gpAR->iButtonImage[ DONELOSE_BUTTON ], (INT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+25), (INT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 245+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02240             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, DoneButtonCallback );
02241       SpecifyGeneralButtonTextAttributes( gpAR->iButton[ DONELOSE_BUTTON ], gpStrategicString[STR_AR_DONE_BUTTON], BLOCKFONT2, 169, FONT_NEARBLACK );
02242       gpAR->iButton[ YES_BUTTON ] = 
02243             QuickCreateButton( gpAR->iButtonImage[ YES_BUTTON ], (INT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+21), (INT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 257+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02244             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, AcceptSurrenderCallback );
02245       gpAR->iButton[ NO_BUTTON ] = 
02246             QuickCreateButton( gpAR->iButtonImage[ NO_BUTTON ], (INT16)(gpAR->sCenterStartX+81), (INT16)(iScreenHeightOffset + 257+gpAR->bVerticalOffset), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02247             DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, RejectSurrenderCallback );
02248       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ YES_BUTTON ] );
02249       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ NO_BUTTON ] );
02250       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ DONEWIN_BUTTON ] );
02251       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ DONELOSE_BUTTON ] );
02252       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] );
02253       ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ PLAY_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02254 }
02255 
02256 void RemoveAutoResolveInterface( BOOLEAN fDeleteForGood )
02257 {
02258       INT32 i;
02259       UINT8 ubCurrentRank;
02260       UINT8 ubCurrentGroupID = 0;
02261       BOOLEAN fFirstGroup = TRUE;
02262 
02263 DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"Autoresolve2");
02264       //VtResumeSampling();
02265       
02266       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gpAR->AutoResolveRegion );
02267       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iPanelImages );
02268       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iFaces );
02269       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( gpAR->iIndent );
02270       DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer );
02271 
02272       if( fDeleteForGood )
02273       { //Delete the soldier instances -- done when we are completely finished.
02274 
02275             //KM: By request of AM, I have added this bleeding event in cases where autoresolve is
02276             //      complete and there are bleeding mercs remaining.  AM coded the internals
02277             //    of the strategic event.
02278             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
02279             {
02280                   if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bBleeding && gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife )
02281                   {
02282                         // ARM: only one event is needed regardless of how many are bleeding
02283                         AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_BANDAGE_BLEEDING_MERCS, GetWorldTotalMin() + 1, 0 );
02284                         break;
02285                   }
02286             }
02287 
02288             // ARM: Update assignment flashing: Doctors may now have new patients or lost them all, etc.
02289             gfReEvaluateEveryonesNothingToDo = TRUE;
02290 
02291             
02292             if( gpAR->pRobotCell)
02293             {
02294                   UpdateRobotControllerGivenRobot( gpAR->pRobotCell->pSoldier );
02295             }
02296             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->iNumMercFaces; i++ )
02297             {
02298                   if( i >= gpAR->iActualMercFaces )
02299                         TacticalRemoveSoldierPointer( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier, FALSE );
02300                   else
02301                   { //Record finishing information for our mercs
02302                         if( !gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife )
02303                         {
02304                               StrategicHandlePlayerTeamMercDeath( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier );
02305                               
02306                               // now remove character from a squad
02307                               RemoveCharacterFromSquads( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier );
02308                               ChangeSoldiersAssignment( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier, ASSIGNMENT_DEAD );
02309 
02310                               AddDeadSoldierToUnLoadedSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0, gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier, RandomGridNo(), ADD_DEAD_SOLDIER_TO_SWEETSPOT );
02311                         }
02312                         else if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_SURRENDERED || gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_CAPTURED )
02313                         {
02314                               EnemyCapturesPlayerSoldier( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier );
02315                         }
02316                         else if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_VICTORY )
02317                         { //merc is alive, so group them at the center gridno.
02318                               gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_CENTER;
02319                         }
02320                         gMercProfiles[ gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->ubProfile ].usBattlesFought++;
02321                   }
02322             }
02323             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->iNumMercFaces; i++ )
02324             {
02325                   if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_VICTORY && gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
02326                   {
02327                         if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID != ubCurrentGroupID )
02328                         {
02329                               ubCurrentGroupID = gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID;
02330 
02331                               // look for NPCs to stop for, anyone is too tired to keep going, if all OK rebuild waypoints & continue movement
02332                               // NOTE: Only the first group found will stop for NPCs, it's just too much hassle to stop them all
02333                               PlayerGroupArrivedSafelyInSector( GetGroup( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->ubGroupID ), fFirstGroup );
02334                               fFirstGroup = FALSE;
02335                         }
02336                   }
02337                   gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier = NULL;
02338             }
02339 
02340             // End capture squence....
02341             if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_SURRENDERED || gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_CAPTURED )
02342             {
02343                   EndCaptureSequence( );
02344             }
02345 
02346       }
02347       //Delete all of the faces.
02348       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->iNumMercFaces; i++ )
02349       {
02350             if( gpMercs[ i ].uiVObjectID != -1 )
02351                   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( gpMercs[ i ].uiVObjectID );
02352             gpMercs[ i ].uiVObjectID = -1;
02353             if( gpMercs[ i ].pRegion )
02354             {
02355                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( gpMercs[ i ].pRegion );
02356                   MemFree( gpMercs[ i ].pRegion );
02357                   gpMercs[ i ].pRegion = NULL;
02358             }
02359       }
02360       //Delete all militia
02361       gbGreenToElitePromotions = 0;
02362       gbGreenToRegPromotions = 0;
02363       gbRegToElitePromotions = 0;
02364       gbMilitiaPromotions = 0;
02365       for( i = 0; i < MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE; i++ )
02366       {
02367             if( gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier )
02368             {
02369                   ubCurrentRank = 255;
02370                   switch( gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier->ubSoldierClass )
02371                   {
02372                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA:         ubCurrentRank = GREEN_MILITIA;            break;
02373                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_REG_MILITIA:                 ubCurrentRank = REGULAR_MILITIA;    break;
02374                         case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE_MILITIA:         ubCurrentRank = ELITE_MILITIA;            break;
02375                         default:
02376                               #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02377                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_ERROR, L"Removing autoresolve militia with invalid ubSoldierClass %d.",gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier->ubSoldierClass );
02378                               #endif
02379                               break;
02380                   }
02381                   if( fDeleteForGood && gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE/2 )
02382                   {
02383                         AddDeadSoldierToUnLoadedSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0, gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier, RandomGridNo(), ADD_DEAD_SOLDIER_TO_SWEETSPOT );
02384 //                      StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, ubCurrentRank, 1 );
02385                         ARRemoveMilitiaMan( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, ubCurrentRank );
02386                         if( ProcessLoyalty() )HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_NATIVE_KILLED, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 );
02387                   }
02388                   else
02389                   {
02390                         UINT8 ubPromotions;
02391                         // this will check for promotions and handle them for you
02392                         if( fDeleteForGood && ( gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier->ubMilitiaKills > 0) && ( ubCurrentRank < ELITE_MILITIA ) )
02393                         {
02394                               ubPromotions = CheckOneMilitiaForPromotion( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, ubCurrentRank, gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier->ubMilitiaKills );
02395                               if( ubPromotions )
02396                               {
02397                                     if( ubPromotions == 2 )
02398                                     {
02399                                           gbGreenToElitePromotions++;
02400                                           gbMilitiaPromotions++;
02401                                     }
02402                                     else if( gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier->ubSoldierClass == SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA )
02403                                     {
02404                                           gbGreenToRegPromotions++;
02405                                           gbMilitiaPromotions++;
02406                                     }
02407                                     else if( gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier->ubSoldierClass == SOLDIER_CLASS_REG_MILITIA )
02408                                     {
02409                                           gbRegToElitePromotions++;
02410                                           gbMilitiaPromotions++;
02411                                     }
02412                               }
02413                         }
02414                   }
02415                   TacticalRemoveSoldierPointer( gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier, FALSE );
02416                   memset( &gpCivs[ i ], 0, sizeof( SOLDIERCELL ) );
02417             }
02418       }
02419 
02420       //Record and process all enemy deaths
02421       for( i = 0; i < MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE; i++ )
02422       {
02423             if( gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier )
02424             {
02425                   if( fDeleteForGood && gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
02426                   {
02427                         TrackEnemiesKilled( ENEMY_KILLED_IN_AUTO_RESOLVE, gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->ubSoldierClass );
02428                         if( ProcessLoyalty() )HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_ENEMY_KILLED, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 );
02429                         ProcessQueenCmdImplicationsOfDeath( gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier );
02430                         AddDeadSoldierToUnLoadedSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0, gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier, RandomGridNo(), ADD_DEAD_SOLDIER_TO_SWEETSPOT );
02431                   }
02432             }
02433       }
02434       //Eliminate all excess soldiers (as more than 32 can exist in the same battle.
02435       //Autoresolve only processes 32, so the excess is slaughtered as the player never
02436       //knew they existed.
02437       if( fDeleteForGood )
02438       { //Warp the game time accordingly
02439             if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_VICTORY )
02440             {     //Get rid of any extra enemies that could be here.  It is possible for the number of total enemies to exceed 32, but
02441                   //autoresolve can only process 32.  We basically cheat by eliminating the rest of them.
02442                   EliminateAllEnemies( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
02443             }
02444             else
02445             { //The enemy won, so repoll movement.
02446                   ResetMovementForEnemyGroupsInLocation( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
02447             }
02448       }
02449       //Physically delete the soldiers now.
02450       for( i = 0; i < MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE; i++ )
02451       {
02452             if( gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier )
02453             {
02454                   TacticalRemoveSoldierPointer( gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier, FALSE );
02455                   memset( &gpEnemies[ i ], 0, sizeof( SOLDIERCELL ) );
02456             }
02457       }
02458 
02459       for( i = 0; i < NUM_AR_BUTTONS; i++ )
02460       {
02461             UnloadButtonImage( gpAR->iButtonImage[ i ] );
02462             RemoveButton( gpAR->iButton[ i ] );
02463       }
02464       if( fDeleteForGood )
02465       { //Warp the game time accordingly
02466 
02467             WarpGameTime( gpAR->uiTotalElapsedBattleTimeInMilliseconds/1000, WARPTIME_NO_PROCESSING_OF_EVENTS );
02468 
02469             //Deallocate all of the global memory.
02470             //Everything internal to them, should have already been deleted.
02471             MemFree( gpAR );
02472             gpAR = NULL;
02473 
02474             MemFree( gpMercs );
02475             gpMercs = NULL;
02476             
02477             MemFree( gpCivs );
02478             gpCivs = NULL;
02479             
02480             MemFree( gpEnemies );
02481             gpEnemies = NULL;
02482 
02483       }
02484 
02485       //KM : Aug 09, 1999 Patch fix -- Would break future dialog while time compressing
02486       gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam = gbPlayerNum;
02487       
02488       gpBattleGroup = NULL;
02489 
02490       if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
02491       {
02492             gubNumCreaturesAttackingTown = 0;
02493             gubSectorIDOfCreatureAttack = 0;
02494       }
02495       //VtPauseSampling();
02496 }
02497 
02498 void PauseButtonCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
02499 {
02500       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02501       {
02502             ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ PLAY_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02503             ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ FAST_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02504             ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ FINISH_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02505             gpAR->fPaused = TRUE;
02506       }
02507 }

02513             ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02514             ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ FAST_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02515             ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ FINISH_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;

02518       }

02526             ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ PLAY_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02527             ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ FINISH_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02528             gpAR->uiTimeSlice = 4000;
02529             gpAR->fPaused = FALSE;
02530       }
02531 }

02538             ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ PLAY_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02539             ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ FAST_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02540             gpAR->uiTimeSlice = 0xffffffff;
02541             gpAR->fSound = FALSE;
02542             gpAR->fPaused = FALSE;

02544       }

02546 
02547 void RetreatButtonCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
02548 {
02549       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02550       {
02551             INT32 i;
02552             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
02553             {
02554                   if( !(gpMercs[ i ].uiFlags & (CELL_RETREATING|CELL_RETREATED)) )
02555                   {
02556                         gpMercs[ i ].uiFlags |= CELL_RETREATING | CELL_DIRTY;
02557                         //Gets to retreat after a total of 2 attacks.
02558                         gpMercs[ i ].usNextAttack = (UINT16)((1000 + gpMercs[ i ].usNextAttack * 2 + PreRandom( 2000 - gpMercs[ i ].usAttack ))*2);
02559                         gpAR->usPlayerAttack -= gpMercs[ i ].usAttack;
02560                         gpMercs[ i ].usAttack = 0;
02561                   }
02562             }
02563             if( gpAR->pRobotCell )
02564             { //if robot is retreating, set the retreat time to be the same as the robot's controller.
02565                   UINT8 ubRobotControllerID;
02566                   
02567                   ubRobotControllerID = gpAR->pRobotCell->pSoldier->ubRobotRemoteHolderID;
02568                   
02569                   if( ubRobotControllerID == NOBODY )
02570                   {
02571                         gpAR->pRobotCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_RETREATING;
02572                         gpAR->pRobotCell->uiFlags |= CELL_DIRTY;
02573                         gpAR->pRobotCell->usNextAttack = 0xffff;
02574                         return;
02575                   }
02576                   for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
02577                   {
02578                         if( ubRobotControllerID == gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->ubID )
02579                         { //Found the controller, make the robot's retreat time match the contollers.
02580                               gpAR->pRobotCell->usNextAttack = gpMercs[ i ].usNextAttack;
02581                               return;
02582                         }
02583                   }
02584             }
02585       }
02586 }
02587 
02588 void DetermineBandageButtonState()
02589 {
02590   INT32 i;
02591       OBJECTTYPE *pKit = NULL;
02592       BOOLEAN fFound = FALSE;
02593 
02594       //Does anyone need bandaging?
02595       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
02596       {
02597             if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bBleeding && gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife )
02598             {
02599                   fFound = TRUE;
02600                   break;
02601             }
02602       }
02603       if( !fFound )
02604       {
02605             DisableButton( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] );
02606             SetButtonFastHelpText( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ], gzLateLocalizedString[ 11 ] );
02607             return;
02608       }
02609 
02610       //Do we have any doctors?  
02611       fFound = FALSE;
02612       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
02613       {
02614             if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && 
02615                     !gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bCollapsed && 
02616                         gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bMedical > 0 )
02617             {
02618                   fFound = TRUE;
02619             }
02620       }
02621       if( !fFound )
02622       {     //No doctors
02623             DisableButton( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] );
02624             SetButtonFastHelpText( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ], gzLateLocalizedString[ 8 ] );
02625             return;
02626       }
02627 
02628       //Do have a kit?
02629       pKit = FindMedicalKit();
02630       if( !pKit )
02631       { //No kits
02632             DisableButton( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] );
02633             SetButtonFastHelpText( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ], gzLateLocalizedString[ 9 ] );
02634             return;
02635       }
02636 
02637       //Allow bandaging.
02638       EnableButton( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] );
02639       SetButtonFastHelpText( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ], gzLateLocalizedString[ 12 ] );
02640 }
02641 
02642 void BandageButtonCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
02643 {
02644       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02645       {
02646             AutoBandageMercs();
02647             SetupDoneInterface();
02648       }
02649 }

02654       {
02655             gpAR->fExitAutoResolve = TRUE; 
02656       }
02657 }
02658 
02659 void MercCellMouseMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
02660 {
02661       //Find the merc with the same region.
02662       INT32 i;
02663       SOLDIERCELL *pCell = NULL;
02664       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
02665       {
02666             if( gpMercs[ i ].pRegion == reg )
02667             {
02668                   pCell = &gpMercs[ i ];
02669                   break;
02670             }
02671       }
02672       Assert( pCell );
02673       if( gpAR->fPendingSurrender )
02674       { //Can't setup retreats when pending surrender.
02675             pCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_SHOWRETREATTEXT;
02676             pCell->uiFlags |= CELL_DIRTY;
02677             return;
02678       }
02679       if( reg->uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
02680       {
02681             if( !(pCell->uiFlags & CELL_SHOWRETREATTEXT) )
02682                   pCell->uiFlags |= CELL_SHOWRETREATTEXT | CELL_DIRTY;
02683       }
02684       else
02685       {
02686             if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_SHOWRETREATTEXT )
02687             {
02688                   pCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_SHOWRETREATTEXT;
02689                   pCell->uiFlags |= CELL_DIRTY;
02690             }
02691       }
02692 }
02693 
02694 void MercCellMouseClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
02695 {
02696       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02697       {
02698             //Find the merc with the same region.
02699             INT32 i;
02700             SOLDIERCELL *pCell = NULL;
02701 
02702             if( gpAR->fPendingSurrender )
02703             { //Can't setup retreats when pending surrender.
02704                   return;
02705             }
02706 
02707             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
02708             {
02709                   if( gpMercs[ i ].pRegion == reg )
02710                   {
02711                         pCell = &gpMercs[ i ];
02712                         break;
02713                   }
02714             }
02715 
02716             if( pCell->uiFlags & ( CELL_RETREATING | CELL_RETREATED ) )
02717             { //already retreated/retreating.
02718                   return;
02719             }
02720 
02721             Assert( pCell );
02722 
02723             if( pCell == gpAR->pRobotCell )
02724             { //robot retreats only when controller retreats
02725                   return;
02726             }
02727             
02728             pCell->uiFlags |= CELL_RETREATING | CELL_DIRTY;
02729             //Gets to retreat after a total of 2 attacks.
02730             pCell->usNextAttack = (UINT16)((1000 + pCell->usNextAttack * 5 + PreRandom( 2000 - pCell->usAttack ))*2);
02731             gpAR->usPlayerAttack -= pCell->usAttack;
02732             pCell->usAttack = 0;
02733 
02734             if( gpAR->pRobotCell )
02735             { //if controller is retreating, make the robot retreat too.
02736                   UINT8 ubRobotControllerID;
02737                   
02738                   ubRobotControllerID = gpAR->pRobotCell->pSoldier->ubRobotRemoteHolderID;
02739                   
02740                   if( ubRobotControllerID == NOBODY )
02741                   {
02742                         gpAR->pRobotCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_RETREATING;
02743                         gpAR->pRobotCell->uiFlags |= CELL_DIRTY;
02744                         gpAR->pRobotCell->usNextAttack = 0xffff;
02745                   }
02746                   else if( ubRobotControllerID == pCell->pSoldier->ubID )
02747                   { //Found the controller, make the robot's retreat time match the contollers.
02748                         gpAR->pRobotCell->uiFlags |= CELL_RETREATING | CELL_DIRTY;
02749                         gpAR->pRobotCell->usNextAttack = pCell->usNextAttack;
02750                         gpAR->usPlayerAttack -= gpAR->pRobotCell->usAttack;
02751                         gpAR->pRobotCell->usAttack = 0;
02752                         return;
02753                   }
02754             }
02755       }
02756 }
02757 
02758 //Determine how many players, militia, and enemies that are going at it, and use these values
02759 //to figure out how many rows and columns we can use.  The will effect the size of the panel.
02760 void CalculateAutoResolveInfo()
02761 {
02762       VOBJECT_DESC VObjectDesc;
02763       GROUP *pGroup;
02764       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
02765       Assert( gpAR->ubSectorX >= 1 && gpAR->ubSectorX <= 16 );
02766       Assert( gpAR->ubSectorY >= 1 && gpAR->ubSectorY <= 16 );
02767 
02768       if( gubEnemyEncounterCode != CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
02769       {
02770 //          GetNumberOfEnemiesInSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 
02771             GetNumberOfEnemiesInFiveSectors( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 
02772                                                                                                 &gpAR->ubAdmins, &gpAR->ubTroops, &gpAR->ubElites );
02773             gpAR->ubEnemies = (UINT8)min( gpAR->ubAdmins + gpAR->ubTroops + gpAR->ubElites, MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE );
02774       }
02775       else
02776       {
02777             if( gfTransferTacticalOppositionToAutoResolve )
02778             {
02779                   DetermineCreatureTownCompositionBasedOnTacticalInformation( &gubNumCreaturesAttackingTown, 
02780                                                                                                                         &gpAR->ubYMCreatures, &gpAR->ubYFCreatures,
02781                                                                                                                         &gpAR->ubAMCreatures, &gpAR->ubAFCreatures );
02782             }
02783             else
02784             {
02785                   DetermineCreatureTownComposition( gubNumCreaturesAttackingTown, 
02786                                                                                                                         &gpAR->ubYMCreatures, &gpAR->ubYFCreatures,
02787                                                                                                                         &gpAR->ubAMCreatures, &gpAR->ubAFCreatures );
02788             }
02789             gpAR->ubEnemies = (UINT8)min( gpAR->ubYMCreatures + gpAR->ubYFCreatures + gpAR->ubAMCreatures + gpAR->ubAFCreatures, MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE );
02790       }
02791       gfTransferTacticalOppositionToAutoResolve = FALSE;
02792 //    gpAR->ubCivs = CountAllMilitiaInSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
02793       gpAR->ubCivs = CountAllMilitiaInFiveSectors( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
02794       gpAR->ubMercs = 0;
02795       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02796       pGroup = gpGroupList;
02797       while( pGroup )
02798       {
02799             if ( PlayerGroupInvolvedInThisCombat( pGroup ) )
02800             {
02801                   pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
02802                   while( pPlayer )
02803                   {
02804                         // NOTE: Must check each merc individually, e.g. Robot without controller is an uninvolved merc on an involved group!
02805                         if ( PlayerMercInvolvedInThisCombat( pPlayer->pSoldier ) )
02806                         {
02807                               gpMercs[ gpAR->ubMercs ].pSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier;
02808 
02809                               //!!! CLEAR OPPCOUNT HERE.  All of these soldiers are guaranteed to not be in tactical anymore.
02810                               //ClearOppCount( pPlayer->pSoldier );
02811 
02812                               gpAR->ubMercs++;
02813                               if( AM_AN_EPC( pPlayer->pSoldier ) )
02814                               {
02815                                     gpAR->fCaptureNotPermittedDueToEPCs = TRUE;
02816                               }
02817                               if( AM_A_ROBOT( pPlayer->pSoldier ) )
02818                               {
02819                                     gpAR->pRobotCell = &gpMercs[ gpAR->ubMercs - 1 ];
02820                                     UpdateRobotControllerGivenRobot( gpAR->pRobotCell->pSoldier );
02821                               }
02822                         }
02823                         pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
02824                   }
02825             }
02826             pGroup = pGroup->next;
02827       }
02828       gpAR->iNumMercFaces = gpAR->ubMercs;
02829       gpAR->iActualMercFaces = gpAR->ubMercs; 
02830       
02831       giMaxMilitiaToRender = 50 - ( (gpAR->ubMercs + 4) / 5 ) * 5;
02832       
02833       CalculateRowsAndColumns();
02834 }
02835 
02836 void ResetAutoResolveInterface()
02837 {
02838       guiPreRandomIndex = gpAR->uiPreRandomIndex;
02839 
02840       RemoveAutoResolveInterface( FALSE );
02841 
02842       gpAR->ubBattleStatus = BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS;
02843 
02844       if( !gpAR->ubCivs && !gpAR->ubMercs )
02845             gpAR->ubCivs = 1;
02846 
02847       //Make sure the number of enemy portraits is the same as needed.
02848       //The debug keypresses may add or remove more than one at a time.
02849       while( gpAR->ubElites + gpAR->ubAdmins + gpAR->ubTroops > gpAR->ubEnemies )
02850       {
02851             switch( PreRandom( 5 ) )
02852             { 
02853                   case 0:                             if( gpAR->ubElites ) { gpAR->ubElites--; break; }
02854                   case 1: case 2: if( gpAR->ubAdmins ) { gpAR->ubAdmins--; break; }
02855                   case 3: case 4: if( gpAR->ubTroops ) { gpAR->ubTroops--; break; }
02856             }
02857       }
02858       while( gpAR->ubElites + gpAR->ubAdmins + gpAR->ubTroops < gpAR->ubEnemies )
02859       {
02860             switch( PreRandom( 5 ) )
02861             {
02862                   case 0:                         gpAR->ubElites++; break;
02863                   case 1: case 2: gpAR->ubAdmins++; break;
02864                   case 3: case 4: gpAR->ubTroops++; break;
02865             }
02866       }
02867       
02868       
02869       //Do the same for the player mercs.
02870       while( gpAR->iNumMercFaces > gpAR->ubMercs && gpAR->iNumMercFaces > gpAR->iActualMercFaces )
02871       { //Removing temp mercs
02872             gpAR->iNumMercFaces--;
02873             TacticalRemoveSoldierPointer( gpMercs[gpAR->iNumMercFaces].pSoldier, FALSE );
02874             gpMercs[gpAR->iNumMercFaces].pSoldier = NULL;
02875       }
02876       while( gpAR->iNumMercFaces < gpAR->ubMercs && gpAR->iNumMercFaces >= gpAR->iActualMercFaces )
02877       {
02878             CreateTempPlayerMerc();
02879       }
02880 
02881       if( gpAR->uiTimeSlice == 0xffffffff )
02882       {
02883             gpAR->fSound = TRUE;
02884       }
02885       gpAR->uiTimeSlice = 1000;
02886       gpAR->uiTotalElapsedBattleTimeInMilliseconds     = 0;
02887       gpAR->uiCurrTime = 0;
02888       gpAR->fPlayerRejectedSurrenderOffer = FALSE;
02889       gpAR->fPendingSurrender = FALSE;
02890       CalculateRowsAndColumns();
02891       CalculateSoldierCells( TRUE);
02892       CreateAutoResolveInterface();
02893       DetermineTeamLeader( TRUE ); //friendly team
02894       DetermineTeamLeader( FALSE ); //enemy team
02895       CalculateAttackValues();
02896 }
02897 
02898 void CalculateRowsAndColumns()
02899 {
02900       //now that we have the number on each team, calculate the number of rows and columns to be used on 
02901       //the player's sides.  NOTE:  Militia won't appear on the same row as mercs.
02902       if( !gpAR->ubMercs )
02903       { //0
02904             gpAR->ubMercCols = gpAR->ubMercRows = 0;
02905       }
02906       else if( gpAR->ubMercs < 5 )
02907       { //1-4
02908             gpAR->ubMercCols = 1;
02909             gpAR->ubMercRows = gpAR->ubMercs;
02910       }
02911       else if( gpAR->ubMercs < 9 || gpAR->ubMercs == 10 )
02912       { //5-8, 10
02913             gpAR->ubMercCols = 2;
02914             gpAR->ubMercRows = (gpAR->ubMercs+1)/2;
02915       }
02916       else if( gpAR->ubMercs < 16 )
02917       { //9, 11-15
02918             gpAR->ubMercCols = 3;
02919             gpAR->ubMercRows = (gpAR->ubMercs+2)/3;
02920       }
02921       else
02922       { //16-MAX_STRATEGIC_TEAM_SIZE
02923             gpAR->ubMercCols = 4;
02924             gpAR->ubMercRows = (gpAR->ubMercs+3)/4;
02925       }
02926 
02927       if( !gpAR->ubCivs )
02928       {
02929             gpAR->ubCivCols = gpAR->ubCivRows = 0;
02930       }
02931       else if( gpAR->ubCivs < 5 )
02932       { //1-4
02933             gpAR->ubCivCols = 1;
02934             gpAR->ubCivRows = gpAR->ubCivs;
02935       }
02936       else if( gpAR->ubCivs < 9 || gpAR->ubCivs == 10 )
02937       { //5-8, 10
02938             gpAR->ubCivCols = 2;
02939             gpAR->ubCivRows = (gpAR->ubCivs+1)/2;
02940       }
02941       else if( gpAR->ubCivs < 16 )
02942       { //9, 11-15
02943             gpAR->ubCivCols = 3;
02944             gpAR->ubCivRows = (gpAR->ubCivs+2)/3;
02945       }
02946       else
02947       { //16-MAX_ALLOWABLE_MILITIA_PER_SECTOR
02948             gpAR->ubCivCols = 4;
02949             gpAR->ubCivRows = (gpAR->ubCivs+3)/4;
02950       }
02951 
02952       if( !gpAR->ubEnemies )
02953       {
02954             gpAR->ubEnemyCols = gpAR->ubEnemyRows = 0;
02955       }
02956       else if( gpAR->ubEnemies < 5 )
02957       { //1-4
02958             gpAR->ubEnemyCols = 1;
02959             gpAR->ubEnemyRows = gpAR->ubEnemies;
02960       }
02961       else if( gpAR->ubEnemies < 9 || gpAR->ubEnemies == 10 )
02962       { //5-8, 10
02963             gpAR->ubEnemyCols = 2;
02964             gpAR->ubEnemyRows = (gpAR->ubEnemies+1)/2;
02965       }
02966       else if( gpAR->ubEnemies < 16 )
02967       { //9, 11-15
02968             gpAR->ubEnemyCols = 3;
02969             gpAR->ubEnemyRows = (gpAR->ubEnemies+2)/3;
02970       }
02971       else
02972       { //16-32
02973             gpAR->ubEnemyCols = 4;
02974             gpAR->ubEnemyRows = (gpAR->ubEnemies+3)/4;
02975       }
02976 
02977 
02978       //Now, that we have the number of mercs, militia, and enemies, it is possible that there
02979       //may be some conflicts.  Our goal is to make the window as small as possible.  Bumping up
02980       //the number of columns to 5 or rows to 10 will force one or both axes to go full screen.  If we
02981       //have high numbers of both, then we will have to.
02982 
02983       //Step one:  equalize the number of columns for both the mercs and civs.
02984       if( gpAR->ubMercs && gpAR->ubCivs && gpAR->ubMercCols != gpAR->ubCivCols )
02985       {
02986             if( gpAR->ubMercCols < gpAR->ubCivCols )
02987             {
02988                   gpAR->ubMercCols = gpAR->ubCivCols;
02989                   gpAR->ubMercRows = (gpAR->ubMercs+gpAR->ubMercCols-1)/gpAR->ubMercCols;
02990             }
02991             else
02992             {
02993                   gpAR->ubCivCols = gpAR->ubMercCols;
02994                   gpAR->ubCivRows = (gpAR->ubCivs+gpAR->ubCivCols-1)/gpAR->ubCivCols;
02995             }
02996       }
02997       //If we have both mercs and militia, we must make sure that the height to width ratio is never higher than
02998       //a factor of two.
02999       if( gpAR->ubMercs && gpAR->ubCivs && gpAR->ubMercRows + gpAR->ubCivRows > 4 )
03000       {
03001             if( gpAR->ubMercCols * 2 < gpAR->ubMercRows + gpAR->ubCivRows )
03002             {
03003                   gpAR->ubMercCols++;
03004                   gpAR->ubMercRows = (gpAR->ubMercs+gpAR->ubMercCols-1)/gpAR->ubMercCols;
03005                   gpAR->ubCivCols++;
03006                   gpAR->ubCivRows = (gpAR->ubCivs+gpAR->ubCivCols-1)/gpAR->ubCivCols;
03007             }
03008       }
03009 
03010 
03011       if( gpAR->ubMercRows + gpAR->ubCivRows > 9 )
03012       { 
03013             if( gpAR->ubMercCols < 5 )
03014             { //bump it up
03015                   gpAR->ubMercCols++;
03016                   gpAR->ubMercRows = (gpAR->ubMercs+gpAR->ubMercCols-1)/gpAR->ubMercCols;
03017             }
03018             if( gpAR->ubCivCols < 5 )
03019             { //match it up with the mercs
03020                   gpAR->ubCivCols++; // = gpAR->ubMercCols;
03021                   gpAR->ubCivRows = (gpAR->ubCivs+gpAR->ubCivCols-1)/gpAR->ubCivCols;
03022             }
03023       }
03024 
03025       if( gpAR->ubMercCols + gpAR->ubEnemyCols == 9 )
03026             gpAR->sWidth = SCREEN_WIDTH;
03027       else
03028             gpAR->sWidth = 146 + 55 * (max( max( gpAR->ubMercCols, gpAR->ubCivCols ), 2 ) + max( gpAR->ubEnemyCols, 2 ));
03029 
03030       // WANNE 2
03031       //gpAR->sCenterStartX = 323 - gpAR->sWidth/2 + max( max( gpAR->ubMercCols, 2), max( gpAR->ubCivCols, 2 ) ) *55;
03032       gpAR->sCenterStartX = iScreenWidthOffset + (323 - gpAR->sWidth/2 + max( max( gpAR->ubMercCols, 2), max( gpAR->ubCivCols, 2 ) ) *55);
03033       
03034 
03035       //Anywhere from 48*3 to 48*10
03036       //gpAR->sHeight = 48 * max( 3, max( gpAR->ubMercRows + gpAR->ubCivRows, gpAR->ubEnemyRows ) );
03037       gpAR->sHeight = 48 * max( 3, max( min( 10, gpAR->ubMercRows + gpAR->ubCivRows ), min( 10, gpAR->ubEnemyRows ) ) );
03038       //Make it an even multiple of 40 (rounding up).
03039       gpAR->sHeight += 39;
03040       gpAR->sHeight /= 40;
03041       gpAR->sHeight *= 40;
03042 
03043       //Here is a extremely bitchy case.  The formulae throughout this module work for most cases.
03044       //However, when combining mercs and civs, the column must be the same.  However, we retract that
03045       //in cases where there are less mercs than available to fill up *most* of the designated space.
03046       if( gpAR->ubMercs && gpAR->ubCivs )
03047       {
03048             if( gpAR->ubMercRows * gpAR->ubMercCols > gpAR->ubMercs + gpAR->ubMercRows )
03049                   gpAR->ubMercCols--;
03050             if( gpAR->ubCivRows * gpAR->ubCivCols > gpAR->ubCivs + gpAR->ubCivRows )
03051                   gpAR->ubCivCols--;
03052       }
03053 }
03054 
03055 void HandleAutoResolveInput()
03056 {
03057 
03058 DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"Autoresolve3");
03059       
03060       InputAtom InputEvent;
03061       BOOLEAN fResetAutoResolve = FALSE;
03062       while( DequeueEvent( &InputEvent ) )
03063       {
03064             if( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN || InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_REPEAT )
03065             {
03066                   switch( InputEvent.usParam )
03067                   {
03068                         case SPACE:
03069                               gpAR->fPaused ^= TRUE;
03070                               if( gpAR->fPaused )
03071                               {
03072                                     ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03073                                     ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ PLAY_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03074                                     ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ FAST_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03075                                     ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ FINISH_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03076                               }
03077                               else
03078                               {
03079                                     ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03080                                     ButtonList[ gpAR->iButton[ PLAY_BUTTON ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03081                               }
03082                               break;
03083                         case 'x':
03084                               if( _KeyDown( ALT ) )
03085                               {
03086                                     HandleShortCutExitState( );
03087                               }
03088                               break;
03089                         #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
03090                         case 'c':
03091                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03092                               {
03093                                     gpAR->fAllowCapture ^= TRUE;
03094                                     gpAR->fPlayerRejectedSurrenderOffer = FALSE;
03095                                     gStrategicStatus.uiFlags &= ~STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_RESCUE;
03096                                     gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve = TRUE;
03097                               }
03098                               break;
03099                         case F5:
03100                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03101                               {
03102                                     gpAR->fDebugInfo ^= TRUE;
03103                               }
03104                               break;
03105                         case F6:
03106                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03107                               {
03108                                     gpAR->fSound ^= TRUE;
03109                               }
03110                               break;
03111                         case F7:
03112                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03113                               {
03114                                     gpAR->fInstantFinish ^= TRUE;
03115                               }
03116                               break;
03117                         case BACKSPACE:
03118                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03119                               {
03120                                     fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03121                               }
03122                               break;
03123                         case 'd':
03124                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03125                               {
03126                                     if( _KeyDown( ALT ) )
03127                                     {
03128                                           if ( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS )
03129                                           {
03130                                                 PlayAutoResolveSample( EXPLOSION_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
03131                                                 EliminateAllFriendlies();
03132                                           }
03133                                     }
03134                               }
03135                               break;
03136                         case 'z':
03137                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03138                               {
03139                                     if( _KeyDown( ALT ) )
03140                                     {
03141                                           if ( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS )
03142                                           {
03143                                                 PlayAutoResolveSample( EXPLOSION_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
03144                                                 EliminateAllMercs();
03145                                           }
03146                                     }
03147                               }
03148                               break;
03149                         case 'o':
03150                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03151                               {
03152                                     if( _KeyDown( ALT ) )
03153                                     {
03154                                           if ( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS )
03155                                           {
03156                                                 PlayAutoResolveSample( EXPLOSION_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
03157                                                 // this is not very accurate, any enemies already dead will be counted as killed twice
03158                                                 gStrategicStatus.usPlayerKills += NumEnemiesInSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
03159                                                 EliminateAllEnemies( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
03160                                           }
03161                                     }
03162                               }
03163                               break;
03164                         case '{':
03165                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03166                               {
03167                                     gpAR->ubMercs = 0;
03168                                     fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03169                               }
03170                               break;
03171                         case '}':
03172                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03173                               {
03174                                     gpAR->ubMercs = MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE;
03175                                     fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03176                               }
03177                               break;
03178                         case '[':
03179                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03180                               {
03181                                     if( gpAR->ubMercs )
03182                                     {
03183                                           gpAR->ubMercs--;
03184                                           fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03185                                     }
03186                               }
03187                               break;
03188                         case ']':
03189                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03190                               {
03191                                     if( gpAR->ubMercs < MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE )
03192                                     {
03193                                           gpAR->ubMercs++;
03194                                           fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03195                                     }
03196                               }
03197                               break;
03198                         case ':':
03199                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03200                               {
03201                                     gpAR->ubCivs = 0;
03202                                     fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03203                               }
03204                               break;
03205                         case '"':
03206                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03207                               {
03208                                     gpAR->ubCivs = MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE;
03209                                     fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03210                               }
03211                               break;
03212                         case ';':
03213                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03214                               {
03215                                     if( gpAR->ubCivs )
03216                                     {
03217                                           gpAR->ubCivs--;
03218                                           fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03219                                     }
03220                               }
03221                               break;
03222                         case 39: // ' quote
03223                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03224                               {
03225                                     if( gpAR->ubCivs < MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE )
03226                                     {
03227                                           gpAR->ubCivs++;
03228                                           fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03229                                     }
03230                               }
03231                               break;
03232                         case '<':
03233                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03234                               {
03235                                     gpAR->ubEnemies = 1;
03236                                     fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03237                               }
03238                               break;
03239                         case '>':
03240                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03241                               {
03242                                     gpAR->ubEnemies = 32;
03243                                     fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03244                               }
03245                               break;
03246                         case ',':
03247                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03248                               {
03249                                     if( gpAR->ubEnemies > 1 )
03250                                     {
03251                                           gpAR->ubEnemies--;
03252                                           fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03253                                     }
03254                               }
03255                               break;
03256                         case '.':
03257                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03258                               {
03259                                     if( gpAR->ubEnemies < 32 )
03260                                     {
03261                                           gpAR->ubEnemies++;
03262                                           fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03263                                     }
03264                               }
03265                               break;
03266                         case '/':
03267                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03268                               {
03269                                     gpAR->ubMercs = 1;
03270                                     gpAR->ubCivs = 0;
03271                                     gpAR->ubEnemies = 1;
03272                                     fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03273                               }
03274                               break;
03275                         case '?':
03276                               if( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() )
03277                               {
03278                                     gpAR->ubMercs = 20;
03279                                     gpAR->ubCivs = MAX_AR_TEAM_SIZE;
03280                                     gpAR->ubEnemies = 32;
03281                                     fResetAutoResolve = TRUE;
03282                               }
03283                               break;
03284                         #endif
03285                   }
03286             }
03287       }
03288       if( fResetAutoResolve )
03289       {
03290             ResetAutoResolveInterface();
03291       }
03292 }
03293 
03294 void RenderSoldierCellHealth( SOLDIERCELL *pCell )
03295 {
03296       INT32 cnt, cntStart;
03297       INT32 xp, yp;
03298       UINT16 *pStr;
03299       UINT16 str[20];
03300       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
03301       UINT32 uiSrcPitchBYTES, uiDestPitchBYTES;
03302       UINT16 usColor;
03303       
03304       SetFont( SMALLCOMPFONT );
03305       //Restore the background before drawing text.
03306       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
03307       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer, &uiSrcPitchBYTES );
03308       xp = pCell->xp + 2;
03309       yp = pCell->yp + 32;
03310       Blt16BPPTo16BPP( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
03311                   (UINT16*)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES, xp, yp, xp-gpAR->Rect.iLeft, yp-gpAR->Rect.iTop, 46, 10 );
03312       UnLockVideoSurface( gpAR->iInterfaceBuffer );
03313       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
03314 
03315       if( pCell->pSoldier->bLife )
03316       {
03317             if( pCell->pSoldier->bLife == pCell->pSoldier->bLifeMax )
03318             {
03319                   cntStart = 4;
03320             }
03321             else
03322             {
03323                   cntStart = 0;
03324             }
03325             for( cnt = cntStart; cnt < 6; cnt ++ )
03326             {
03327                   if( pCell->pSoldier->bLife < bHealthStrRanges[ cnt ] )
03328                   {
03329                         break;
03330                   }
03331             }
03332             switch( cnt )
03333             {
03334                   case 0: //DYING
03335                   case 1: //CRITICAL
03336                         usColor = FONT_RED;
03337                         break;
03338                   case 2: //WOUNDED
03339                   case 3: //POOR
03340                         usColor = FONT_YELLOW;
03341                         break;
03342                   default: //REST
03343                         usColor = FONT_GRAY1;
03344                         break;
03345             }
03346             if( cnt > 3 && pCell->pSoldier->bLife != pCell->pSoldier->bLifeMax )
03347             { //Merc has taken damage, even though his life if good.
03348                   usColor = FONT_YELLOW;
03349             }
03350             if( pCell->pSoldier->bLife == pCell->pSoldier->bLifeMax )
03351                   usColor = FONT_GRAY1;
03352             pStr = zHealthStr[ cnt ];
03353       }
03354       else
03355       {
03356             wcscpy( str, pCell->pSoldier->name );
03357             pStr = _wcsupr( str );
03358             usColor = FONT_BLACK;
03359       }
03360 
03361       //Draw the retreating text, if applicable
03362       if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_RETREATED && gpAR->ubBattleStatus != BATTLE_VICTORY )
03363       {
03364             usColor = FONT_LTGREEN;
03365             swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_MERC_RETREATED ] );
03366             pStr = str;
03367       }
03368       else if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_RETREATING && gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS )
03369       {
03370             if( pCell->pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
03371             { //Retreating is shared with the status string.  Alternate between the
03372                   //two every 450 milliseconds
03373                   if( GetJA2Clock() % 900 < 450 )
03374                   { //override the health string with the retreating string.
03375                         usColor = FONT_LTRED;
03376                         swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_MERC_RETREATING ] );
03377                         pStr = str;
03378                   }
03379             }
03380       }
03381       else if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_SHOWRETREATTEXT && gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS )
03382       {
03383             if( pCell->pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
03384             {
03385                   SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
03386                   swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_AR_MERC_RETREAT ] );
03387                   xp = pCell->xp + 25 - StringPixLength( pStr, SMALLCOMPFONT ) / 2;
03388                   yp = pCell->yp + 12;
03389                   mprintf( xp, yp, str );
03390             }
03391       }
03392       SetFontForeground( (UINT8)usColor );
03393       xp = pCell->xp + 25 - StringPixLength( pStr, SMALLCOMPFONT ) / 2;
03394       yp = pCell->yp + 33;
03395       mprintf( xp, yp, pStr );
03396 }
03397 
03398 UINT8 GetUnusedMercProfileID()
03399 {
03400       UINT8 ubRandom=0;
03401       INT32 i;
03402       BOOLEAN fUnique = FALSE;
03403       while( !fUnique )
03404       {
03405             ubRandom = (UINT8)PreRandom( 40 );
03406             for( i = 0; i < 19; i++ )
03407             {
03408                   fUnique = TRUE;
03409                   if( Menptr[ i ].ubProfile == ubRandom )
03410                   {
03411                         fUnique = FALSE;
03412                         break;
03413                   }
03414             }
03415       }
03416       return ubRandom;
03417 }
03418 
03419 void CreateTempPlayerMerc()
03420 {
03421       SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT          MercCreateStruct;
03422       static INT32       iSoldierCount=0;     
03423       UINT8                                     ubID;
03424 
03425       //Init the merc create structure with basic information
03426       memset( &MercCreateStruct, 0, sizeof( MercCreateStruct ) );
03427       MercCreateStruct.bTeam                                                  = SOLDIER_CREATE_AUTO_TEAM;
03428       MercCreateStruct.ubProfile                                        = GetUnusedMercProfileID();
03429       MercCreateStruct.sSectorX                                               = gpAR->ubSectorX;
03430       MercCreateStruct.sSectorY                                               = gpAR->ubSectorY;
03431       MercCreateStruct.bSectorZ                                               = 0;
03432       MercCreateStruct.fPlayerMerc                                = TRUE;
03433       MercCreateStruct.fCopyProfileItemsOver    = TRUE;
03434 
03435       //Create the player soldier
03436 
03437       gpMercs[ gpAR->iNumMercFaces ].pSoldier = TacticalCreateSoldier( &MercCreateStruct, &ubID );
03438       if( gpMercs[ gpAR->iNumMercFaces ].pSoldier )
03439       {
03440             gpAR->iNumMercFaces++;
03441       }
03442 }
03443 
03444 void DetermineTeamLeader( BOOLEAN fFriendlyTeam )
03445 {
03446       INT32 i;
03447       SOLDIERCELL *pBestLeaderCell = NULL;
03448       //For each team (civs and players count as same team), find the merc with the best 
03449       //leadership ability.
03450       if( fFriendlyTeam )
03451       {
03452             gpAR->ubPlayerLeadership = 0;
03453             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
03454             {
03455                   if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLeadership > gpAR->ubPlayerLeadership )
03456                   {
03457                         gpAR->ubPlayerLeadership = gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLeadership;
03458                         pBestLeaderCell = &gpMercs[ i ];
03459                   }
03460             }
03461             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubCivs; i++ )
03462             {
03463                   if( gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier->bLeadership > gpAR->ubPlayerLeadership )
03464                   {
03465                         gpAR->ubPlayerLeadership = gpCivs[ i ].pSoldier->bLeadership;
03466                         pBestLeaderCell = &gpCivs[ i ];
03467                   }
03468             }
03469 
03470             if( pBestLeaderCell )
03471             {
03472                   //Assign the best leader the honour of team leader.
03473                   pBestLeaderCell->uiFlags |= CELL_TEAMLEADER;
03474             }
03475             return;
03476       }
03477       //ENEMY TEAM
03478       gpAR->ubEnemyLeadership = 0;
03479       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
03480       {
03481             if( gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->bLeadership > gpAR->ubEnemyLeadership )
03482             {
03483                   gpAR->ubEnemyLeadership = gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->bLeadership;
03484                   pBestLeaderCell = &gpEnemies[ i ];
03485             }
03486       }
03487       if( pBestLeaderCell )
03488       {
03489             //Assign the best enemy leader the honour of team leader
03490             pBestLeaderCell->uiFlags |= CELL_TEAMLEADER;
03491       }
03492 }
03493 
03494 void ResetNextAttackCounter( SOLDIERCELL *pCell )
03495 {
03496       pCell->usNextAttack = min( 1000 - pCell->usAttack, 800 );
03497       pCell->usNextAttack = (UINT16)(1000 + pCell->usNextAttack * 5 + PreRandom( 2000 - pCell->usAttack ) );
03498       if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_CREATURE )
03499       {
03500             pCell->usNextAttack = pCell->usNextAttack * 8 / 10;
03501       }
03502 }
03503 
03504 FLOAT CalcClassBonusOrPenalty( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03505 {
03506       switch( pSoldier->ubSoldierClass )
03507       {
03508       case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE:
03509       case SOLDIER_CLASS_ELITE_MILITIA:
03510             return 1.3f;
03511       case SOLDIER_CLASS_ARMY:
03512       case SOLDIER_CLASS_REG_MILITIA:
03513             return 1.0f;
03514       case SOLDIER_CLASS_ADMINISTRATOR:
03515       case SOLDIER_CLASS_GREEN_MILITIA:
03516             return 0.7f;
03517       }
03518 
03519       return 1.0f;
03520 }
03521 
03522 void CalculateAttackValues()
03523 {
03524       INT32 i;
03525       SOLDIERCELL *pCell;
03526       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
03527       UINT16 usBonus;
03528       UINT16 usBestAttack = 0xffff;
03529       UINT16 usBreathStrengthPercentage;
03530       //INT16 sOutnumberBonus = 0;
03531       INT16 sMaxBonus = 0;
03532       //PLAYER TEAM
03533       gpAR->usPlayerAttack = 0;
03534       gpAR->usPlayerDefence = 0;
03535 
03536       //if( gpAR->ubEnemies )
03537       //{
03538       //    //bonus equals 20 if good guys outnumber bad guys 2 to 1.
03539       //    sMaxBonus = 20;
03540       //    sOutnumberBonus = (INT16)(gpAR->ubMercs + gpAR->ubCivs) * sMaxBonus / gpAR->ubEnemies - sMaxBonus;
03541       //    sOutnumberBonus = (INT16)min( sOutnumberBonus, max( sMaxBonus, 0 ) );
03542       //}
03543 
03544       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
03545       {
03546             pCell = &gpMercs[ i ];  
03547             pSoldier = pCell->pSoldier;
03548             if( !pSoldier->bLife )
03549                   continue;
03550             pCell->usAttack =       pSoldier->bStrength + 
03551                                                                         pSoldier->bDexterity +
03552                                                                         pSoldier->bWisdom +
03553                                                                         pSoldier->bMarksmanship +
03554                                                                         pSoldier->bMorale;
03555             //Give player controlled mercs a significant bonus to compensate for lack of control
03556             //as the player would typically do much better in tactical.
03557             if( pCell->usAttack < 1000 )
03558             { //A player with 500 attack will be augmented to 625
03559                   //A player with 600 attack will be augmented to 700
03560                   pCell->usAttack = (UINT16)(pCell->usAttack + (1000 - pCell->usAttack) / 4);
03561             }
03562             usBreathStrengthPercentage = 100 - ( 100 - pCell->pSoldier->bBreathMax ) / 3;
03563             pCell->usAttack =       pCell->usAttack * usBreathStrengthPercentage / 100;
03564             pCell->usDefence =      pSoldier->bAgility +
03565                                                                         pSoldier->bWisdom +
03566                                                                         pSoldier->bBreathMax +
03567                                                                         pSoldier->bMedical +
03568                                                                         pSoldier->bMorale;
03569             //100 team leadership adds a bonus of 10%, 
03570             usBonus = 100 + gpAR->ubPlayerLeadership/10;// + sOutnumberBonus;
03571 
03572             //bExpLevel adds a bonus of 7% per level after 2, level 1 soldiers get a 7% decrease
03573             //usBonus += 7 * (pSoldier->bExpLevel-2);
03574             usBonus += EXP_BONUS * (pSoldier->bExpLevel-5);
03575             usBonus += gpAR->ubPlayerDefenceAdvantage;
03576             pCell->usAttack = pCell->usAttack * usBonus / 100;
03577             pCell->usDefence = pCell->usDefence * usBonus / 100;
03578 
03579             if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_EPC )
03580             { //strengthen the defense (seeing the mercs will keep them safe).
03581                   pCell->usAttack = 0;
03582                   pCell->usDefence = 1000;
03583             }
03584 
03585             pCell->usAttack = min( pCell->usAttack, 1000 );
03586             pCell->usDefence = min( pCell->usDefence, 1000 );
03587       
03588             gpAR->usPlayerAttack += pCell->usAttack;
03589             gpAR->usPlayerDefence += pCell->usDefence;
03590             ResetNextAttackCounter( pCell );
03591             if( i > 8 )
