03592             { //Too many mercs, delay attack entry of extra mercs.
03593                   pCell->usNextAttack += (UINT16)( ( i - 8 ) * 2000 );
03594             }
03595             if( pCell->usNextAttack < usBestAttack )
03596                   usBestAttack = pCell->usNextAttack;
03597       }
03598       //CIVS
03599       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubCivs; i++ )
03600       {
03601             pCell = &gpCivs[ i ];   
03602             pSoldier = pCell->pSoldier;
03603             pCell->usAttack =       pSoldier->bStrength + 
03604                                                                         pSoldier->bDexterity +
03605                                                                         pSoldier->bWisdom +
03606                                                                         pSoldier->bMarksmanship +
03607                                                                         pSoldier->bMorale;
03608             pCell->usAttack =       pCell->usAttack * pSoldier->bBreath / 100;
03609             pCell->usDefence =      pSoldier->bAgility +
03610                                                                         pSoldier->bWisdom +
03611                                                                         pSoldier->bBreathMax +
03612                                                                         pSoldier->bMedical +
03613                                                                         pSoldier->bMorale;
03614             //100 team leadership adds a bonus of 10%
03615             usBonus = 100 + gpAR->ubPlayerLeadership/10;// + sOutnumberBonus;
03616             //bExpLevel adds a bonus of 7% per level after 2, level 1 soldiers get a 7% decrease
03617             //usBonus += 7 * (pSoldier->bExpLevel-2);
03618             usBonus += EXP_BONUS * (pSoldier->bExpLevel-5);
03619             usBonus += gpAR->ubPlayerDefenceAdvantage;
03620             pCell->usAttack = pCell->usAttack * usBonus / 100;
03621             pCell->usDefence = pCell->usDefence * usBonus / 100;
03622 
03623             pCell->usAttack = (UINT16)( pCell->usAttack * CalcClassBonusOrPenalty( pCell->pSoldier ) );
03624             pCell->usDefence =(UINT16)( pCell->usDefence * CalcClassBonusOrPenalty( pCell->pSoldier ) );
03625 
03626             pCell->usAttack = min( pCell->usAttack, 1000 );
03627             pCell->usDefence = min( pCell->usDefence, 1000 );
03628             
03629             gpAR->usPlayerAttack += pCell->usAttack;
03630             gpAR->usPlayerDefence += pCell->usDefence;
03631             ResetNextAttackCounter( pCell );
03632             if( i > 6 )
03633             { //Too many militia, delay attack entry of extra mercs.
03634                   pCell->usNextAttack += (UINT32)(( i - 4 ) * 2000 );
03635             }
03636 
03637 
03638             if( i >= CountAllMilitiaInSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY  ) )
03639             { //Extra delay if soldier's from reinforcement
03640                   pCell->usNextAttack += REINFORCMENT_ATTACK_DELAY_PER_SOLDIER_IN_SECTOR * CountAllMilitiaInSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY  );
03641             }
03642 
03643 
03644             if( pCell->usNextAttack < usBestAttack )
03645                   usBestAttack = pCell->usNextAttack;
03646       }
03647       //ENEMIES
03648       gpAR->usEnemyAttack = 0;
03649       gpAR->usEnemyDefence = 0;
03650       //if( gpAR->ubMercs + gpAR->ubCivs )
03651       //{
03652       //    //bonus equals 20 if good guys outnumber bad guys 2 to 1.
03653       //    sMaxBonus = 20;
03654       //    sOutnumberBonus = (INT16)gpAR->ubEnemies * sMaxBonus / (gpAR->ubMercs + gpAR->ubCivs) - sMaxBonus;
03655       //    sOutnumberBonus = (INT16)min( sOutnumberBonus, max( sMaxBonus, 0 ) );
03656       //}
03657 
03658       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
03659       {
03660             pCell = &gpEnemies[ i ];      
03661             pSoldier = pCell->pSoldier;
03662             pCell->usAttack =       pSoldier->bStrength + 
03663                                                                         pSoldier->bDexterity +
03664                                                                         pSoldier->bWisdom +
03665                                                                         pSoldier->bMarksmanship +
03666                                                                         pSoldier->bMorale;
03667             pCell->usAttack =       pCell->usAttack * pSoldier->bBreath / 100;
03668             pCell->usDefence =      pSoldier->bAgility +
03669                                                                         pSoldier->bWisdom +
03670                                                                         pSoldier->bBreathMax +
03671                                                                         pSoldier->bMedical +
03672                                                                         pSoldier->bMorale;
03673             //100 team leadership adds a bonus of 10%
03674             usBonus = 100 + gpAR->ubPlayerLeadership/10;// + sOutnumberBonus;
03675             //bExpLevel adds a bonus of 7% per level after 2, level 1 soldiers get a 7% decrease
03676             //usBonus += 7 * (pSoldier->bExpLevel-2);
03677             usBonus += EXP_BONUS * (pSoldier->bExpLevel-5);
03678             usBonus += gpAR->ubEnemyDefenceAdvantage;
03679             pCell->usAttack  = pCell->usAttack * usBonus / 100;
03680             pCell->usDefence = pCell->usDefence * usBonus / 100;
03681             pCell->usAttack  = (UINT16)( pCell->usAttack * CalcClassBonusOrPenalty( pCell->pSoldier ) );
03682             pCell->usDefence = (UINT16)( pCell->usDefence * CalcClassBonusOrPenalty( pCell->pSoldier ) );
03683 
03684             pCell->usAttack = min( pCell->usAttack, 1000 );
03685             pCell->usDefence = min( pCell->usDefence, 1000 );
03686             
03687             gpAR->usEnemyAttack += pCell->usAttack;
03688             gpAR->usEnemyDefence += pCell->usDefence;
03689             ResetNextAttackCounter( pCell );
03690 
03691             if( i > 4 && !(pCell->uiFlags & CELL_CREATURE) )
03692             { //Too many enemies, delay attack entry of extra mercs.
03693                   pCell->usNextAttack += (UINT32)( ( i - 4 ) * 1000 );
03694             }
03695 
03696             if(i >= NumEnemiesInSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY  ) && !(pCell->uiFlags & CELL_CREATURE) )
03697             { //Extra delay if it's a reinforcement
03698                   pCell->usNextAttack += REINFORCMENT_ATTACK_DELAY_PER_SOLDIER_IN_SECTOR * NumEnemiesInSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY  );
03699             }
03700 
03701             
03702             if( pCell->usNextAttack < usBestAttack )
03703                   usBestAttack = pCell->usNextAttack;
03704       }
03705       //Now, because we are starting a new battle, we want to get the ball rolling a bit earlier.  So,
03706       //we will take the usBestAttack value and subtract 60% of it from everybody's next attack.
03707       usBestAttack = usBestAttack * 60 / 100;
03708       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
03709             gpMercs[ i ].usNextAttack -= usBestAttack;      
03710       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubCivs; i++ )
03711             gpCivs[ i ].usNextAttack -= usBestAttack; 
03712       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
03713             gpEnemies[ i ].usNextAttack -= usBestAttack;    
03714 }
03715 
03716 void DrawDebugText( SOLDIERCELL *pCell )
03717 {
03718       INT32 xp, yp;
03719       if( !gpAR->fDebugInfo )
03720             return;
03721       SetFont( SMALLCOMPFONT );
03722       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
03723       xp = pCell->xp + 4;
03724       yp = pCell->yp + 4;
03725       if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_TEAMLEADER )
03726       {
03727             //debug str
03728             mprintf( xp, yp, L"LEADER" );
03729             yp += 9;
03730       }
03731       mprintf( xp, yp, L"AT: %d", pCell->usAttack );
03732       yp += 9;
03733       mprintf( xp, yp, L"DF: %d", pCell->usDefence );
03734       yp += 9;
03735 
03736       xp = pCell->xp;
03737       yp = pCell->yp - 4;
03738       SetFont( LARGEFONT1 );
03739       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
03740       if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_FIREDATTARGET )
03741       {
03742             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
03743             mprintf( xp, yp, L"FIRE" );
03744             pCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_FIREDATTARGET;
03745             yp += 13;
03746       }
03747       if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_DODGEDATTACK )
03748       {
03749             SetFontForeground( FONT_BLUE );
03750             mprintf( xp, yp, L"MISS" );
03751             pCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_DODGEDATTACK;
03752             yp += 13;
03753       }
03754       if( pCell->uiFlags & CELL_HITBYATTACKER )
03755       {
03756             SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
03757             mprintf( xp, yp, L"HIT" );
03758             pCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_HITBYATTACKER;
03759             yp += 13;
03760       }
03761 }
03762 
03763 SOLDIERCELL* ChooseTarget( SOLDIERCELL *pAttacker )
03764 {
03765       INT32 iAvailableTargets;
03766       INT32 index;
03767       INT32 iRandom = -1;
03768       SOLDIERCELL *pTarget = NULL;
03769       UINT32 usSavedDefence;
03770       //Determine what team we are attacking
03771       if( pAttacker->uiFlags & (CELL_ENEMY | CELL_CREATURE) )
03772       { //enemy team attacking a player
03773             iAvailableTargets = gpAR->ubMercs + gpAR->ubCivs;
03774             index = 0;
03775             usSavedDefence = gpAR->usPlayerDefence;
03776             while( iAvailableTargets )
03777             {
03778                   pTarget = ( index < gpAR->ubMercs ) ? &gpMercs[ index ] : &gpCivs[ index - gpAR->ubMercs ];
03779                   if( !pTarget->pSoldier->bLife || pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_RETREATED )
03780                   {
03781                         index++;
03782                         iAvailableTargets--;
03783                         continue;
03784                   }
03785                   iRandom = PreRandom( gpAR->usPlayerDefence );
03786                   gpAR->usPlayerDefence -= pTarget->usDefence;
03787                   if( iRandom < pTarget->usDefence )
03788                   {
03789                         gpAR->usPlayerDefence = usSavedDefence;
03790                         return pTarget;
03791                   }
03792                   index++;
03793                   iAvailableTargets--;
03794             }
03795             if( !IsBattleOver() )
03796             {
03797                   AssertMsg( 0, String("***Please send PRIOR save and screenshot of this message***  iAvailableTargets %d, index %d, iRandom %d, defence %d. ",
03798                         iAvailableTargets, index, iRandom, gpAR->usPlayerDefence) );
03799             }
03800       }
03801       else
03802       { //player team attacking an enemy
03803             iAvailableTargets = gpAR->ubEnemies;
03804             index = 0;
03805             usSavedDefence = gpAR->usEnemyDefence;
03806             while( iAvailableTargets )
03807             {
03808                   pTarget = &gpEnemies[ index ];
03809                   if( !pTarget->pSoldier->bLife )
03810                   {
03811                         index++;
03812                         iAvailableTargets--;
03813                         continue;
03814                   }
03815                   iRandom = PreRandom( gpAR->usEnemyDefence );
03816                   gpAR->usEnemyDefence -= pTarget->usDefence;
03817                   if( iRandom < pTarget->usDefence )
03818                   {
03819                         gpAR->usEnemyDefence = usSavedDefence;
03820                         return pTarget;
03821                   }
03822                   index++;
03823                   iAvailableTargets--;
03824             }
03825       }
03826       AssertMsg( 0, "Error in ChooseTarget logic for choosing enemy target." );
03827       return NULL;
03828 }
03829 
03830 BOOLEAN FireAShot( SOLDIERCELL *pAttacker )
03831 {
03832       OBJECTTYPE *pItem;
03833       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
03834       INT32 i;
03835 
03836       pSoldier = pAttacker->pSoldier;
03837 
03838       if( pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_MALECREATURE )
03839       {
03840             PlayAutoResolveSample( ACR_SPIT, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
03841             pAttacker->bWeaponSlot = SECONDHANDPOS;
03842             return TRUE;
03843       }
03844       for( i = 0; i < NUM_INV_SLOTS; i++ )
03845       {
03846             pItem = &pSoldier->inv[ i ];
03847 
03848             if( Item[ pItem->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
03849             {
03850                   pAttacker->bWeaponSlot = (INT8)i;
03851                   if( gpAR->fUnlimitedAmmo )
03852                   {
03853                         PlayAutoResolveSample( Weapon[ pItem->usItem ].sSound, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                
03854                         return TRUE;
03855                   }
03856                   if( !pItem->ubGunShotsLeft )
03857                   {
03858                         AutoReload( pSoldier );
03859                         if ( pItem->ubGunShotsLeft && Weapon[ pItem->usItem ].sLocknLoadSound )
03860                         {
03861                               PlayAutoResolveSample( Weapon[ pItem->usItem ].sLocknLoadSound, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
03862                         }
03863                   }
03864                   if( pItem->ubGunShotsLeft )
03865                   {
03866                         PlayAutoResolveSample( Weapon[ pItem->usItem ].sSound, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );                
03867                         if( pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
03868                         {
03869                               gMercProfiles[ pAttacker->pSoldier->ubProfile ].usShotsFired++;
03870                               // MARKSMANSHIP GAIN: Attacker fires a shot
03871 
03872                               StatChange( pAttacker->pSoldier, MARKAMT, 3, FALSE );
03873                         }
03874                         pItem->ubGunShotsLeft--;
03875                         return TRUE;
03876                   }
03877             }
03878       }
03879       pAttacker->bWeaponSlot = -1;
03880       return FALSE;
03881 }
03882 
03883 BOOLEAN AttackerHasKnife( SOLDIERCELL *pAttacker )
03884 {
03885       INT32 i;
03886       for( i = 0; i < NUM_INV_SLOTS; i++ )
03887       {
03888             if( Item[ pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ i ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_BLADE )
03889             {
03890                   pAttacker->bWeaponSlot = (INT8)i;
03891                   return TRUE;
03892             }
03893       }
03894       pAttacker->bWeaponSlot = -1;
03895       return FALSE;
03896 }
03897 
03898 BOOLEAN TargetHasLoadedGun( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03899 {
03900       INT32 i;
03901       OBJECTTYPE *pItem;
03902       for( i = 0; i < NUM_INV_SLOTS; i++ )
03903       {
03904             pItem = &pSoldier->inv[ i ];
03905             if( Item[ pItem->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
03906             {
03907                   if( gpAR->fUnlimitedAmmo )
03908                   {
03909                         return TRUE;
03910                   }
03911                   if( pItem->ubGunShotsLeft )
03912                   {
03913                         return TRUE;
03914                   }
03915             }
03916       }
03917       return FALSE;
03918 }
03919 
03920 void AttackTarget( SOLDIERCELL *pAttacker, SOLDIERCELL *pTarget )
03921 {
03922       UINT16 usAttack;
03923       UINT16 usDefence;
03924       UINT8 ubImpact;
03925       UINT8 ubLocation;
03926       UINT8 ubAccuracy;
03927       INT32 iRandom;
03928       INT32 iImpact;
03929       INT32 iNewLife;
03930       BOOLEAN fMelee = FALSE;
03931       BOOLEAN fKnife = FALSE;
03932       BOOLEAN fClaw = FALSE;
03933       INT8  bAttackIndex = -1;
03934 
03935       pAttacker->uiFlags |= CELL_FIREDATTARGET | CELL_DIRTY;
03936       if( pAttacker->usAttack < 950 )
03937             usAttack = (UINT16)(pAttacker->usAttack + PreRandom(2000 - pAttacker->usAttack ));
03938       else 
03939             usAttack = (UINT16)(950 + PreRandom( 50 ));
03940       if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_RETREATING && !(pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_FEMALECREATURE) )
03941       { //Attacking a retreating merc is harder.  Modify the attack value to 70% of it's value.
03942             //This allows retreaters to have a better chance of escaping.
03943             usAttack = usAttack * 7 / 10;
03944       }
03945       if( pTarget->usDefence < 950 )
03946             usDefence = (UINT16)(pTarget->usDefence + PreRandom(2000 - pTarget->usDefence ));
03947       else 
03948             usDefence = (UINT16)(950 + PreRandom( 50 ));
03949       if( pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_FEMALECREATURE )
03950       {
03951             pAttacker->bWeaponSlot = HANDPOS;
03952             fMelee = TRUE;
03953             fClaw = TRUE;
03954       }
03955       else if( !FireAShot( pAttacker ) )
03956       { //Maybe look for a weapon, such as a knife or grenade?
03957             fMelee = TRUE;
03958             fKnife = AttackerHasKnife( pAttacker );
03959             if( TargetHasLoadedGun( pTarget->pSoldier ) )
03960             { //Penalty to attack with melee weapons against target with loaded gun.
03961                   if( !(pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_CREATURE ) )
03962                   { //except for creatures
03963                         if( fKnife )
03964                               usAttack = usAttack * 6 / 10;
03965                         else
03966                               usAttack = usAttack * 4 / 10;
03967                   }
03968             }
03969       }
03970       //Set up a random delay for the hit or miss.
03971       if( !fMelee )
03972       {
03973             if( !pTarget->usNextHit[0] )
03974             {
03975                   bAttackIndex = 0;
03976             }
03977             else if( !pTarget->usNextHit[1] )
03978             {
03979                   bAttackIndex = 1;
03980             }
03981             else if( !pTarget->usNextHit[2] )
03982             {
03983                   bAttackIndex = 2;
03984             }
03985             if ( bAttackIndex != -1 )
03986             {
03987                   pTarget->usNextHit[ bAttackIndex ] = (UINT16)( 50 + PreRandom( 400 ) );
03988                   pTarget->pAttacker[ bAttackIndex ] = pAttacker;
03989             }           
03990       }
03991       if( usAttack < usDefence )
03992       {
03993             if( pTarget->pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE || !PreRandom( 5 ) )
03994             {     //Attacker misses -- use up a round of ammo.  If target is unconcious, then 80% chance of hitting.
03995                   pTarget->uiFlags |= CELL_DODGEDATTACK | CELL_DIRTY;
03996                   if( fMelee )
03997                   {
03998                         if( fKnife )
03999                               PlayAutoResolveSample( MISS_KNIFE, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04000                         else if( fClaw )
04001                         {
04002                               if( Chance( 50 ) )
04003                               {
04004                                     PlayAutoResolveSample( ACR_SWIPE, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04005                               }
04006                               else
04007                               {
04008                                     PlayAutoResolveSample( ACR_LUNGE, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04009                               }
04010                         }
04011                         else 
04012                               PlayAutoResolveSample( SWOOSH_1 + PreRandom( 6 ), RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04013                         if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04014                               // AGILITY GAIN: Target "dodged" an attack
04015                               StatChange( pTarget->pSoldier, AGILAMT, 5, FALSE );
04016                   }
04017                   return;
04018             }
04019       }
04020       //Attacker hits
04021       if( !fMelee )
04022       {
04023             //ubImpact = (UINT8) GetDamage(&pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ pAttacker->bWeaponSlot ]);
04024             ubImpact = Weapon[ pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ pAttacker->bWeaponSlot ].usItem ].ubImpact;
04025             iRandom = PreRandom( 100 );
04026             if( iRandom < 15 )
04027                   ubLocation = AIM_SHOT_HEAD;
04028             else if( iRandom < 30 )
04029                   ubLocation = AIM_SHOT_LEGS;
04030             else 
04031                   ubLocation = AIM_SHOT_TORSO;
04032             ubAccuracy = (UINT8)((usAttack - usDefence + PreRandom( usDefence - pTarget->usDefence ) )/10);
04033             iImpact = BulletImpact( pAttacker->pSoldier, pTarget->pSoldier, ubLocation, ubImpact, ubAccuracy, NULL );
04034 
04035             if ( bAttackIndex == -1 )
04036             {
04037                   // tack damage on to end of last hit
04038                   pTarget->usHitDamage[2] += (UINT16) iImpact;
04039             }
04040             else
04041             {
04042                   pTarget->usHitDamage[ bAttackIndex ] = (UINT16) iImpact;
04043             }
04044 
04045       }
04046       else
04047       {
04048             OBJECTTYPE *pItem;
04049             //OBJECTTYPE tempItem;
04050             PlayAutoResolveSample( (UINT8)(BULLET_IMPACT_1+PreRandom(3)), RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04051             if( !pTarget->pSoldier->bLife )
04052             { //Soldier already dead (can't kill him again!)
04053                   return;
04054             }
04055 
04056             ubAccuracy = (UINT8)((usAttack - usDefence + PreRandom( usDefence - pTarget->usDefence ) )/10);  
04057 
04058             //Determine attacking weapon.
04059             pAttacker->pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon = 0;
04060             if( pAttacker->bWeaponSlot != -1 )
04061             {
04062                   pItem = &pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ pAttacker->bWeaponSlot ];
04063                   if( Item[ pItem->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
04064                         pAttacker->pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon = pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ pAttacker->bWeaponSlot ].usItem;
04065             }
04066             
04067             //if( pAttacker->bWeaponSlot != HANDPOS )
04068             //{ //switch items                  
04069             //    memcpy( &tempItem, &pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ], sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );                
04070             //    memcpy( &pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ], &pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ pAttacker->bWeaponSlot ], sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) ); //CTD
04071             //    iImpact = HTHImpact( pAttacker->pSoldier, pTarget->pSoldier, ubAccuracy, (BOOLEAN)(fKnife | fClaw) );
04072             //    memcpy( &pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ pAttacker->bWeaponSlot ], &pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ], sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04073             //    memcpy( &pAttacker->pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ], &tempItem, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
04074             //}
04075             //else
04076             //{
04077             //    iImpact = HTHImpact( pAttacker->pSoldier, pTarget->pSoldier, ubAccuracy, (BOOLEAN)(fKnife || fClaw) );
04078             //}
04079             iImpact = 0;
04080             iNewLife = pTarget->pSoldier->bLife - iImpact;
04081 
04082             if( pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04083             { //Attacker is a player, so increment the number of shots that hit.
04084                   gMercProfiles[ pAttacker->pSoldier->ubProfile ].usShotsHit++;
04085                   // MARKSMANSHIP GAIN: Attacker's shot hits
04086                   StatChange( pAttacker->pSoldier, MARKAMT, 6, FALSE );       // in addition to 3 for taking a shot
04087             }
04088             if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04089             { //Target is a player, so increment the times he has been wounded.
04090                   gMercProfiles[ pTarget->pSoldier->ubProfile ].usTimesWounded++;
04091                   // EXPERIENCE GAIN: Took some damage
04092                   StatChange( pTarget->pSoldier, EXPERAMT, ( UINT16 )( 5 * ( iImpact / 10 ) ), FALSE );
04093             }
04094             if( pTarget->pSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS || pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_CREATURE )
04095             {
04096                   if( gpAR->fSound )
04097                         DoMercBattleSound( pTarget->pSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_HIT1 + PreRandom( 2 ) ) );
04098             }
04099             if( !(pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_CREATURE) && iNewLife < OKLIFE && pTarget->pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
04100             { //the hit caused the merc to fall.  Play the falling sound
04101                   PlayAutoResolveSample( (UINT8)FALL_1, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04102                   pTarget->uiFlags &= ~CELL_RETREATING;
04103             }
04104             if( iNewLife <= 0 )
04105             { //soldier has been killed
04106                   if( pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04107                   { //Player killed the enemy soldier -- update his stats as well as any assisters.
04108                         gMercProfiles[ pAttacker->pSoldier->ubProfile ].usKills++;
04109                         gStrategicStatus.usPlayerKills++;
04110                   }
04111                   else if( pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_MILITIA )
04112                   {
04113                         pAttacker->pSoldier->ubMilitiaKills += 2;
04114                   }
04115                   if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MERC && gpAR->fSound )
04116                   {
04117                         PlayAutoResolveSample( (UINT8)DOORCR_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04118                         PlayAutoResolveSample( (UINT8)HEADCR_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04119                   }
04120             }
04121             //Adjust the soldiers stats based on the damage.
04122             pTarget->pSoldier->bLife = (INT8)max( iNewLife, 0 );
04123             if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MERC && gpAR->pRobotCell)
04124             {
04125                   UpdateRobotControllerGivenRobot( gpAR->pRobotCell->pSoldier );
04126             }
04127             if( fKnife || fClaw )
04128             {
04129                   if( pTarget->pSoldier->bLifeMax - pTarget->pSoldier->bBleeding - iImpact >= pTarget->pSoldier->bLife )
04130                         pTarget->pSoldier->bBleeding += (INT8)iImpact;
04131                   else
04132                         pTarget->pSoldier->bBleeding = (INT8)(pTarget->pSoldier->bLifeMax - pTarget->pSoldier->bLife);
04133             }
04134             if( !pTarget->pSoldier->bLife )
04135             {
04136                   gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve = TRUE;
04137                   #ifdef INVULNERABILITY
04138                   if( 1 )
04139                         RefreshMerc( pTarget->pSoldier );
04140                   else
04141                   #endif
04142                   if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04143                   {
04144                         gpAR->usPlayerAttack -= pTarget->usAttack;
04145                         gpAR->usPlayerDefence -= pTarget->usDefence;
04146                         gpAR->ubAliveMercs--;
04147                         pTarget->usAttack = 0;
04148                         pTarget->usDefence = 0;
04149                   }
04150                   else if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MILITIA )
04151                   {
04152                         gpAR->usPlayerAttack -= pTarget->usAttack;
04153                         gpAR->usPlayerDefence -= pTarget->usDefence;
04154                         gpAR->ubAliveCivs--;
04155                         pTarget->usAttack = 0;
04156                         pTarget->usDefence = 0;
04157                   }
04158                   else if( pTarget->uiFlags & (CELL_ENEMY|CELL_CREATURE) )
04159                   {
04160                         gpAR->usEnemyAttack -= pTarget->usAttack;
04161                         gpAR->usEnemyDefence -= pTarget->usDefence;
04162                         gpAR->ubAliveEnemies--;
04163                         pTarget->usAttack = 0;
04164                         pTarget->usDefence = 0;
04165                   }
04166             }
04167             pTarget->uiFlags |= CELL_HITBYATTACKER | CELL_DIRTY;
04168       }
04169 }
04170 
04171 void TargetHitCallback( SOLDIERCELL *pTarget, INT32 index )
04172 {
04173       INT32 iNewLife;
04174       SOLDIERCELL *pAttacker;
04175       if( !pTarget->pSoldier->bLife )
04176       { //Soldier already dead (can't kill him again!)
04177             return;
04178       }
04179       pAttacker = pTarget->pAttacker[ index ];
04180 
04181       //creatures get damage reduction bonuses
04182       switch( pTarget->pSoldier->ubBodyType )
04183       {
04184             case LARVAE_MONSTER:
04185             case INFANT_MONSTER:
04186                   break;
04187             case YAF_MONSTER:
04188             case YAM_MONSTER:
04189                   pTarget->usHitDamage[index] = (pTarget->usHitDamage[index] + 2) / 4;
04190                   break;
04191             case ADULTFEMALEMONSTER:
04192             case AM_MONSTER:
04193                   pTarget->usHitDamage[index] = (pTarget->usHitDamage[index] + 3) / 6;
04194                   break;
04195             case QUEENMONSTER:
04196                   pTarget->usHitDamage[index] = (pTarget->usHitDamage[index] + 4) / 8;
04197                   break;
04198       }
04199       
04200       iNewLife = pTarget->pSoldier->bLife - pTarget->usHitDamage[index];
04201       if( !pTarget->usHitDamage[index] )
04202       { //bullet missed -- play a ricochet sound.
04203             if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04204                   // AGILITY GAIN: Target "dodged" an attack
04205                   StatChange( pTarget->pSoldier, AGILAMT, 5, FALSE );
04206             PlayAutoResolveSample( MISS_1 + PreRandom(8), RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04207             return;
04208       }
04209       
04210       if( pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04211       { //Attacker is a player, so increment the number of shots that hit.
04212             gMercProfiles[ pAttacker->pSoldier->ubProfile ].usShotsHit++;
04213             // MARKSMANSHIP GAIN: Attacker's shot hits
04214             StatChange( pAttacker->pSoldier, MARKAMT, 6, FALSE );       // in addition to 3 for taking a shot
04215       }
04216       if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MERC && pTarget->usHitDamage[ index ] )
04217       { //Target is a player, so increment the times he has been wounded.
04218             gMercProfiles[ pTarget->pSoldier->ubProfile ].usTimesWounded++;
04219             // EXPERIENCE GAIN: Took some damage
04220             StatChange( pTarget->pSoldier, EXPERAMT, ( UINT16 )( 5 * ( pTarget->usHitDamage[ index ] / 10 ) ), FALSE );
04221       }
04222 
04223       //bullet hit -- play an impact sound and a merc hit sound
04224       PlayAutoResolveSample( (UINT8)(BULLET_IMPACT_1+PreRandom(3)), RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04225 
04226       if( pTarget->pSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
04227       {
04228             if( gpAR->fSound )
04229                   DoMercBattleSound( pTarget->pSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_HIT1 + PreRandom( 2 ) ) );
04230       }
04231       if( iNewLife < OKLIFE && pTarget->pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
04232       { //the hit caused the merc to fall.  Play the falling sound
04233             PlayAutoResolveSample( (UINT8)FALL_1, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04234             pTarget->uiFlags &= ~CELL_RETREATING;
04235       }
04236       if( iNewLife <= 0 )
04237       { //soldier has been killed
04238             if( pTarget->pAttacker[ index ]->uiFlags & CELL_PLAYER )
04239             { //Player killed the enemy soldier -- update his stats as well as any assisters.
04240                   SOLDIERCELL *pKiller;
04241                   SOLDIERCELL *pAssister1, *pAssister2;
04242                   pKiller = pTarget->pAttacker[ index ];
04243                   pAssister1 = pTarget->pAttacker[ index < 2 ? index + 1 : 0 ];
04244                   pAssister2 = pTarget->pAttacker[ index > 0 ? index - 1 : 2 ];
04245                   if( pKiller == pAssister1 )
04246                         pAssister1 = NULL;
04247                   if( pKiller == pAssister2 )
04248                         pAssister2 = NULL;
04249                   if( pAssister1 == pAssister2 )
04250                         pAssister2 = NULL;
04251                   if( pKiller )
04252                   {
04253                         if( pKiller->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04254                         {
04255                               gMercProfiles[ pKiller->pSoldier->ubProfile ].usKills++;
04256                               gStrategicStatus.usPlayerKills++;
04257                               // EXPERIENCE CLASS GAIN:  Earned a kill
04258                               StatChange( pKiller->pSoldier, EXPERAMT, ( UINT16 )( 10 * pTarget->pSoldier->bLevel ), FALSE );
04259                               HandleMoraleEvent( pKiller->pSoldier, MORALE_KILLED_ENEMY, gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0  );
04260                         }
04261                         else if( pKiller->uiFlags & CELL_MILITIA )
04262                               pKiller->pSoldier->ubMilitiaKills += 2;
04263                   }
04264                   if( pAssister1 )
04265                   {
04266                         if( pAssister1->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04267                         {
04268                               gMercProfiles[ pAssister1->pSoldier->ubProfile ].usAssists++;
04269                               // EXPERIENCE CLASS GAIN:  Earned an assist
04270                               StatChange( pAssister1->pSoldier, EXPERAMT, ( UINT16 )( 5 * pTarget->pSoldier->bLevel ), FALSE );
04271                         }
04272                         else if( pAssister1->uiFlags & CELL_MILITIA )
04273                               pAssister1->pSoldier->ubMilitiaKills++;
04274                   }
04275                   else if( pAssister2 )
04276                   {
04277                         if( pAssister2->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04278                         {
04279                               gMercProfiles[ pAssister2->pSoldier->ubProfile ].usAssists++;
04280                               // EXPERIENCE CLASS GAIN:  Earned an assist
04281                               StatChange( pAssister2->pSoldier, EXPERAMT, ( UINT16 )( 5 * pTarget->pSoldier->bLevel ), FALSE );
04282                         }
04283                         else if( pAssister2->uiFlags & CELL_MILITIA )
04284                               pAssister2->pSoldier->ubMilitiaKills++;
04285                   }
04286             }
04287             if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MERC && gpAR->fSound )
04288             {
04289                   PlayAutoResolveSample( (UINT8)DOORCR_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04290                   PlayAutoResolveSample( (UINT8)HEADCR_1, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04291             }
04292             if( iNewLife < -60 && !(pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_CREATURE) )
04293             { //High damage death
04294                   if( gpAR->fSound )
04295                   {
04296                         if( PreRandom( 3 ) )
04297                               PlayAutoResolveSample( (UINT8)BODY_SPLAT_1, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04298                         else
04299                               PlayAutoResolveSample( (UINT8)HEADSPLAT_1, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04300                   }
04301             }
04302             else
04303             { //Normal death
04304                   if( gpAR->fSound )
04305                   {
04306                         DoMercBattleSound( pTarget->pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_DIE1 );
04307                   }
04308             }
04309             #ifdef INVULNERABILITY
04310                   RefreshMerc( pTarget->pSoldier );
04311                   return;
04312             #endif
04313       }
04314       //Adjust the soldiers stats based on the damage.
04315       pTarget->pSoldier->bLife = (INT8)max( iNewLife, 0 );
04316       if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MERC && gpAR->pRobotCell)
04317       {
04318             UpdateRobotControllerGivenRobot( gpAR->pRobotCell->pSoldier );
04319       }
04320 
04321       if( pTarget->pSoldier->bLifeMax - pTarget->pSoldier->bBleeding - pTarget->usHitDamage[index] >= pTarget->pSoldier->bLife )
04322             pTarget->pSoldier->bBleeding += (INT8)pTarget->usHitDamage[index];
04323       else
04324             pTarget->pSoldier->bBleeding = (INT8)(pTarget->pSoldier->bLifeMax - pTarget->pSoldier->bLife);
04325       if( !pTarget->pSoldier->bLife )
04326       {
04327             gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve = TRUE;
04328             if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MERC )
04329             {
04330                   gpAR->usPlayerAttack -= pTarget->usAttack;
04331                   gpAR->usPlayerDefence -= pTarget->usDefence;
04332                   gpAR->ubAliveMercs--;
04333                   pTarget->usAttack = 0;
04334                   pTarget->usDefence = 0;
04335             }
04336             else if( pTarget->uiFlags & CELL_MILITIA )
04337             {
04338                   gpAR->usPlayerAttack -= pTarget->usAttack;
04339                   gpAR->usPlayerDefence -= pTarget->usDefence;
04340                   gpAR->ubAliveCivs--;
04341                   pTarget->usAttack = 0;
04342                   pTarget->usDefence = 0;
04343             }
04344             else if( pTarget->uiFlags & (CELL_ENEMY|CELL_CREATURE) )
04345             {
04346                   gpAR->usEnemyAttack -= pTarget->usAttack;
04347                   gpAR->usEnemyDefence -= pTarget->usDefence;
04348                   gpAR->ubAliveEnemies--;
04349                   pTarget->usAttack = 0;
04350                   pTarget->usDefence = 0;
04351             }
04352       }
04353       pTarget->uiFlags |= CELL_HITBYATTACKER | CELL_DIRTY;
04354 }
04355 
04356 void Delay( UINT32 uiMilliseconds )
04357 {
04358       INT32 iTime;
04359       iTime = GetJA2Clock();
04360       while( GetJA2Clock() < iTime + uiMilliseconds );
04361 }
04362 
04363 BOOLEAN IsBattleOver()
04364 {
04365       INT32 i;
04366       INT32 iNumInvolvedMercs = 0;
04367       INT32 iNumMercsRetreated = 0;
04368       BOOLEAN fOnlyEPCsLeft = TRUE;
04369       if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus != BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS )
04370             return TRUE;
04371       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
04372       {
04373             if( !(gpMercs[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_RETREATED) && gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife )
04374             {
04375                   if( !(gpMercs[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_EPC) )
04376                   {
04377                         fOnlyEPCsLeft = FALSE;
04378                         iNumInvolvedMercs++;
04379                   }
04380             }
04381             if( gpMercs[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_RETREATED )
04382             {
04383                   iNumMercsRetreated++;
04384             }
04385       }
04386       if( gpAR->pRobotCell )
04387       { //Do special robot checks
04388             SOLDIERTYPE *pRobot;
04389             pRobot = gpAR->pRobotCell->pSoldier;
04390             if( pRobot->ubRobotRemoteHolderID == NOBODY )
04391             { //Robot can't fight anymore.
04392                   gpAR->usPlayerAttack -= gpAR->pRobotCell->usAttack;
04393                   gpAR->pRobotCell->usAttack = 0;
04394                   if( iNumInvolvedMercs == 1 && !gpAR->ubAliveCivs )
04395                   { //Robot is the only one left in battle, so instantly kill him.
04396                         DoMercBattleSound( pRobot, BATTLE_SOUND_DIE1 );
04397                         pRobot->bLife = 0;
04398                         gpAR->ubAliveMercs--;
04399                         iNumInvolvedMercs = 0;
04400                   }
04401             }
04402       }
04403       if( !gpAR->ubAliveCivs && !iNumInvolvedMercs && iNumMercsRetreated )
04404       { //RETREATED
04405             gpAR->ubBattleStatus = BATTLE_RETREAT;
04406 
04407             // wake everyone up
04408             WakeUpAllMercsInSectorUnderAttack( );
04409 
04410             RetreatAllInvolvedPlayerGroups( );
04411       }
04412       else if( !gpAR->ubAliveCivs && !iNumInvolvedMercs )
04413       { //DEFEAT
04414             if( fOnlyEPCsLeft )
04415             { //Kill the EPCs.
04416                   for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
04417                   {
04418                         if( gpMercs[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_EPC )
04419                         {
04420                               DoMercBattleSound( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_DIE1 );
04421                               gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife = 0;
04422                               gpAR->ubAliveMercs--;
04423                         }
04424                   }
04425             }
04426             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
04427             {
04428                   if( gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->bLife )
04429                   {
04430                         if( gubEnemyEncounterCode != CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE )
04431                         {
04432                               DoMercBattleSound( gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_LAUGH1 );
04433                         }
04434                         else
04435                         {
04436                               PlayJA2Sample( ACR_EATFLESH, RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04437                         }
04438                         break;
04439                   }
04440             }
04441             gpAR->ubBattleStatus = BATTLE_DEFEAT;
04442       }
04443       else if( !gpAR->ubAliveEnemies )
04444       { //VICTORY
04445             gpAR->ubBattleStatus = BATTLE_VICTORY;
04446       }
04447       else
04448       {
04449             return FALSE;
04450       }
04451       SetupDoneInterface();
04452       return TRUE;
04453 }
04454 
04455 
04456 //#define TESTSURRENDER
04457 
04458 BOOLEAN AttemptPlayerCapture()
04459 {
04460       INT32 i;
04461       BOOLEAN fConcious;
04462       INT32 iConciousEnemies;
04463 
04464 #ifndef TESTSURRENDER
04465 
04466       //Only attempt capture if day is less than four.
04467       if( GetWorldDay() < STARTDAY_ALLOW_PLAYER_CAPTURE_FOR_RESCUE && !gpAR->fAllowCapture )
04468       {
04469             return FALSE;
04470       }
04471       if( gpAR->fPlayerRejectedSurrenderOffer )
04472       {
04473             return FALSE;
04474       }
04475       if( gStrategicStatus.uiFlags & STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_RESCUE )
04476       {
04477             return FALSE;
04478       }
04479       if( gpAR->fCaptureNotPermittedDueToEPCs )
04480       { //EPCs make things much more difficult when considering capture.  Simply don't allow it.
04481             return FALSE;
04482       }
04483       //Only attempt capture of mercs if there are 2 or 3 of them alive
04484       if( gpAR->ubAliveCivs || gpAR->ubAliveMercs < 2 || gpAR->ubAliveMercs > 3 )
04485       {
04486             return FALSE;
04487       }
04488       //if the number of alive enemies doesn't double the number of alive mercs, don't offer surrender.
04489       if( gpAR->ubAliveEnemies < gpAR->ubAliveMercs*2 )
04490       {
04491             return FALSE;
04492       }
04493       //make sure that these enemies are actually concious!
04494       iConciousEnemies = 0;
04495       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
04496       {
04497             if( gpEnemies[ i ].pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
04498             {
04499                   iConciousEnemies++;
04500             }
04501       }
04502       if( iConciousEnemies < gpAR->ubAliveMercs * 2 )
04503       {
04504             return FALSE;
04505       }
04506 
04507       //So far, the conditions are right.  Now, we will determine if the the remaining players are
04508       //wounded and/or unconcious.  If any are concious, we will prompt for a surrender, otherwise,
04509       //it is automatic.
04510       fConcious = FALSE;
04511       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
04512       {
04513             //if any of the 2 or 3 mercs has more than 60% life, then return.
04514             if( gpMercs[ i ].uiFlags & CELL_ROBOT )
04515             {
04516                   return FALSE;
04517             }
04518             if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife*100 > gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLifeMax*60 )
04519             {
04520                   return FALSE;
04521             }
04522             if( gpMercs[ i ].pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
04523             {
04524                   fConcious = TRUE;
04525             }
04526       }
04527       if( fConcious ) 
04528       {
04529             if( PreRandom( 100 ) < 2 )
04530             {
04531                   SetupSurrenderInterface();
04532             }
04533       }
04534       else if( PreRandom( 100 ) < 25 )
04535       {
04536 #else
04537       {
04538 #endif
04539 
04540             BeginCaptureSquence( );
04541 
04542             gpAR->ubBattleStatus = BATTLE_CAPTURED;
04543             gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve = TRUE;
04544             SetupDoneInterface();
04545       }
04546       return TRUE;
04547 }
04548 
04549 void SetupDoneInterface()
04550 {
04551       INT32 i;
04552       gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve = TRUE;
04553 
04554       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] );
04555       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ PLAY_BUTTON ] );
04556       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ FAST_BUTTON ] );
04557       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ FINISH_BUTTON ] );
04558       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ RETREAT_BUTTON ] );
04559       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ YES_BUTTON ] );
04560       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ NO_BUTTON ] );
04561       if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_VICTORY && gpAR->ubAliveMercs )
04562       {
04563             ShowButton( gpAR->iButton[ DONEWIN_BUTTON ] );
04564             ShowButton( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] );
04565       }
04566       else
04567       {
04568             ShowButton( gpAR->iButton[ DONELOSE_BUTTON ] );
04569       }
04570       DetermineBandageButtonState();
04571       for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
04572       { //So they can't retreat!
04573             MSYS_DisableRegion( gpMercs[ i ].pRegion );
04574       }
04575 }
04576 
04577 void SetupSurrenderInterface()
04578 {
04579       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] );
04580       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ PLAY_BUTTON ] );
04581       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ FAST_BUTTON ] );
04582       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ FINISH_BUTTON ] );
04583       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ RETREAT_BUTTON ] );
04584       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] );
04585       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ DONEWIN_BUTTON ] );
04586       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ DONELOSE_BUTTON ] );
04587       ShowButton( gpAR->iButton[ YES_BUTTON ] );
04588       ShowButton( gpAR->iButton[ NO_BUTTON ] );
04589       gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve = TRUE;
04590       gpAR->fPendingSurrender = TRUE;
04591 }
04592 
04593 void HideSurrenderInterface()
04594 {
04595       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ PAUSE_BUTTON ] );
04596       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ PLAY_BUTTON ] );
04597       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ FAST_BUTTON ] );
04598       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ FINISH_BUTTON ] );
04599       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ RETREAT_BUTTON ] );
04600       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ BANDAGE_BUTTON ] );
04601       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ DONEWIN_BUTTON ] );
04602       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ DONELOSE_BUTTON ] );
04603       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ YES_BUTTON ] );
04604       HideButton( gpAR->iButton[ NO_BUTTON ] );
04605       gpAR->fPendingSurrender = FALSE;
04606       gpAR->fRenderAutoResolve = TRUE;
04607 }
04608 
04609 void AcceptSurrenderCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
04610 {
04611       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
04612       {
04613             BeginCaptureSquence( );
04614 
04615             gpAR->ubBattleStatus = BATTLE_SURRENDERED;
04616             gpAR->fPendingSurrender = FALSE;
04617             SetupDoneInterface();
04618       }
04619 }
04620 
04621 void RejectSurrenderCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
04622 {
04623       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
04624       {
04625             gpAR->fPlayerRejectedSurrenderOffer = TRUE;
04626             HideSurrenderInterface();
04627       }
04628 }
04629 
04630 
04631 void ProcessBattleFrame()
04632 {
04633       INT32 iRandom;
04634       INT32 i;
04635       SOLDIERCELL *pAttacker, *pTarget;
04636       UINT32 uiDiff;
04637       static INT32 iTimeSlice = 0;
04638       static BOOLEAN fContinue = FALSE;
04639       static UINT32 uiSlice = 0;
04640       static INT32 iTotal = 0;
04641       static INT32 iMercs = 0;
04642       static INT32 iCivs = 0;
04643       static INT32 iEnemies = 0;
04644       static INT32 iMercsLeft = 0;
04645       static INT32 iCivsLeft = 0;
04646       static INT32 iEnemiesLeft = 0;
04647       BOOLEAN found = FALSE;
04648       INT32 iTime, iAttacksThisFrame;
04649 
04650       pAttacker = NULL;
04651       iAttacksThisFrame = 0;
04652 
04653       if( fContinue )
04654       {
04655             gpAR->uiCurrTime = GetJA2Clock();
04656             fContinue = FALSE;
04657             goto CONTINUE_BATTLE;
04658       }
04659       //determine how much real-time has passed since the last frame
04660       if( gpAR->uiCurrTime )
04661       {
04662             gpAR->uiPrevTime = gpAR->uiCurrTime;
04663             gpAR->uiCurrTime = GetJA2Clock();
04664       }
04665       else
04666       {
04667             gpAR->uiCurrTime = GetJA2Clock();
04668             return;
04669       }
04670       if( gpAR->fPaused )
04671             return;
04672 
04673       uiDiff = gpAR->uiCurrTime - gpAR->uiPrevTime;
04674       if( gpAR->uiTimeSlice < 0xffffffff )
04675       {
04676             iTimeSlice = uiDiff*gpAR->uiTimeSlice/1000;
04677       }
04678       else
04679       { //largest positive signed value
04680             iTimeSlice = 0x7fffffff;
04681       }
04682 
04683       while( iTimeSlice > 0 )
04684       {
04685             uiSlice = min( iTimeSlice, 1000 );
04686             if( gpAR->ubBattleStatus == BATTLE_IN_PROGRESS )
04687                   gpAR->uiTotalElapsedBattleTimeInMilliseconds += uiSlice;
04688 
04689             //Now process each of the players
04690             iTotal = gpAR->ubMercs + gpAR->ubCivs + gpAR->ubEnemies + 1;
04691             iMercs       = iMercsLeft           = gpAR->ubMercs;
04692             iCivs        = iCivsLeft            = gpAR->ubCivs;
04693             iEnemies = iEnemiesLeft = gpAR->ubEnemies;
04694             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubMercs; i++ )
04695                   gpMercs[ i ].uiFlags &= ~CELL_PROCESSED;
04696             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubCivs; i++ )
04697                   gpCivs[ i ].uiFlags &= ~CELL_PROCESSED;
04698             for( i = 0; i < gpAR->ubEnemies; i++ )
04699                   gpEnemies[ i ].uiFlags &= ~CELL_PROCESSED;
04700             while( --iTotal )
04701             {
04702                   INT32 cnt;
04703                   if( iTimeSlice != 0x7fffffff && GetJA2Clock() > gpAR->uiCurrTime+17 ||
04704                         !gpAR->fInstantFinish && iAttacksThisFrame > (gpAR->ubMercs+gpAR->ubCivs+gpAR->ubEnemies)/4 )
04705                   { //We have spent too much time in here.  In order to maintain 60FPS, we will
04706                         //leave now, which will allow for updating of the graphics (and mouse cursor),
04707                         //and all of the necessary locals are saved via static variables.  It'll check
04708                         //the fContinue flag, and goto the CONTINUE_BATTLE label the next time this function
04709                         //is called.
04710                         fContinue = TRUE;
04711                         return;
04712                   }
04713                   CONTINUE_BATTLE:
04714                   if( IsBattleOver() || gubEnemyEncounterCode != CREATURE_ATTACK_CODE && AttemptPlayerCapture() )
04715                         return;
04716 
04717                   iRandom = PreRandom( iTotal );
04718                   found = FALSE;
04719                   if( iMercs && iRandom < iMercsLeft )
04720                   {
04721                         iMercsLeft--;
04722                         while( !found )
04723                         {
04724                               iRandom = Random( iMercs );
04725                               pAttacker = &gpMercs[ iRandom ];
04726                               if( !(pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_PROCESSED ) )
04727                               {
04728                                     pAttacker->uiFlags |= CELL_PROCESSED;
04729                                     found = TRUE;
04730                               }
04731                         }
04732                   }
04733                   else if( iCivs && iRandom < iMercsLeft + iCivsLeft )
04734                   {
04735                         iCivsLeft--;
04736                         while( !found )
04737                         {
04738                               iRandom = Random( iCivs );
04739                               pAttacker = &gpCivs[ iRandom ];
04740                               if( !(pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_PROCESSED ) )
04741                               {
04742                                     pAttacker->uiFlags |= CELL_PROCESSED;
04743                                     found = TRUE;
04744                               }
04745                         }
04746                   }
04747                   else if( iEnemies && iEnemiesLeft )
04748                   {
04749                         iEnemiesLeft--;
04750                         while( !found )
04751                         {
04752                               iRandom = Random( iEnemies );
04753                               pAttacker = &gpEnemies[ iRandom ];
04754                               if( !(pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_PROCESSED ) )
04755                               {
04756                                     pAttacker->uiFlags |= CELL_PROCESSED;
04757                                     found = TRUE;
04758                               }
04759                         }
04760                   }
04761                   else
04762                         AssertMsg( 0, "Logic error in ProcessBattleFrame()" );
04763                   //Apply damage and play miss/hit sounds if delay between firing and hit has expired.
04764                   if( !(pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_RETREATED ) )
04765                   {
04766                         for( cnt = 0; cnt < 3; cnt++ )
04767                         { //Check if any incoming bullets have hit the target.
04768                               if( pAttacker->usNextHit[ cnt ] )
04769                               {
04770                                     iTime = pAttacker->usNextHit[ cnt ];
04771                                     iTime -= uiSlice;
04772                                     if( iTime >= 0 )
04773                                     { //Bullet still on route.  
04774                                           pAttacker->usNextHit[ cnt ] = (UINT16)iTime;
04775                                     }
04776                                     else
04777                                     { //Bullet is going to hit/miss.
04778                                           TargetHitCallback( pAttacker, cnt );
04779                                           pAttacker->usNextHit[ cnt ] = 0;
04780                                     }
04781                               }
04782                         }
04783                   }
04784                   if( pAttacker->pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE || pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_RETREATED )
04785                   {
04786                         if( !(pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_CREATURE) || !pAttacker->pSoldier->bLife )
04787                               continue; //can't attack if you are unconcious or not around (Or a live creature)
04788                   }
04789                   iTime = pAttacker->usNextAttack;
04790                   iTime -= uiSlice;
04791                   if( iTime > 0 )
04792                   {
04793                         pAttacker->usNextAttack = (UINT32)iTime;
04794                         continue;
04795                   }
04796                   else
04797                   {
04798                         if( pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_RETREATING )
04799                         { //The merc has successfully retreated.  Remove the stats, and continue on.
04800                               if( pAttacker == gpAR->pRobotCell )
04801                               {
04802                                     if( gpAR->pRobotCell->pSoldier->ubRobotRemoteHolderID == NOBODY )
04803                                     {
04804                                           gpAR->pRobotCell->uiFlags &= ~CELL_RETREATING;
04805                                           gpAR->pRobotCell->uiFlags |= CELL_DIRTY;
04806                                           gpAR->pRobotCell->usNextAttack = 0xffff;
04807                                           continue;
04808                                     }
04809                               }
04810                               gpAR->usPlayerDefence -= pAttacker->usDefence;
04811                               pAttacker->usDefence = 0;
04812                               pAttacker->uiFlags |= CELL_RETREATED;
04813                               continue;
04814                         }
04815                         if( pAttacker->usAttack )
04816                         {
04817                               pTarget = ChooseTarget( pAttacker );
04818                               if( pAttacker->uiFlags & CELL_CREATURE && PreRandom( 100 ) < 7 )
04819                                     PlayAutoResolveSample( ACR_SMELL_THREAT + PreRandom( 2 ), RATE_11025, 50, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
04820                               else
04821                                     AttackTarget( pAttacker, pTarget );
04822                               ResetNextAttackCounter( pAttacker );
04823                               pAttacker->usNextAttack += (UINT32)iTime; //tack on the remainder
04824                               iAttacksThisFrame++;
04825                         }
04826                   }
04827             }
04828             if( iTimeSlice != 0x7fffffff )//|| !gpAR->fInstantFinish )
04829             {
04830                   iTimeSlice -= 1000;
04831             }
04832       }
04833 }

04836 BOOLEAN IsAutoResolveActive()
04837 {
04838       //is the autoresolve up or not?
04839       if( gpAR )
04840       {
04841             return TRUE;
04842       }
04843       return FALSE;
04844 }

04846 UINT8 GetAutoResolveSectorID()
04847 {
04848       if( gpAR )
04849       {
04850             return (UINT8)SECTOR( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY );
04851       }
04852       return 0xff;
04853 }
04854 
04855 //Returns TRUE if a battle is happening or sector is loaded
04856 BOOLEAN GetCurrentBattleSectorXYZ( INT16 *psSectorX, INT16 *psSectorY, INT16 *psSectorZ )
04857 {
04858       if( gpAR )
04859       {
04860             *psSectorX = gpAR->ubSectorX; 
04861             *psSectorY = gpAR->ubSectorY; 
04862             *psSectorZ = 0;   
04863             return TRUE;
04864       }
04865       else if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
04866       {
04867             *psSectorX = gubPBSectorX;
04868             *psSectorY = gubPBSectorY;
04869             *psSectorZ = gubPBSectorZ;
04870             return TRUE;
04871       }
04872       else if( gfWorldLoaded )
04873       {
04874             *psSectorX = gWorldSectorX;
04875             *psSectorY = gWorldSectorY;
04876             *psSectorZ = gbWorldSectorZ;
04877             return TRUE;
04878       }
04879       else
04880       {
04881             *psSectorX = 0;
04882             *psSectorY = 0;
04883             *psSectorZ = -1;
04884             return FALSE;
04885       }
04886 }
04887 
04888 //Returns TRUE if a battle is happening ONLY
04889 BOOLEAN GetCurrentBattleSectorXYZAndReturnTRUEIfThereIsABattle( INT16 *psSectorX, INT16 *psSectorY, INT16 *psSectorZ )
04890 {
04891       if ( ( psSectorX == NULL )||(psSectorY == NULL )||(psSectorZ == NULL ) )
04892       {     
04893             return FALSE;
04894       }
04895 
04896       if( gpAR )
04897       {
04898             *psSectorX = gpAR->ubSectorX; 
04899             *psSectorY = gpAR->ubSectorY; 
04900             *psSectorZ = 0;   
04901             return TRUE;
04902       }
04903       else if( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive )
04904       {
04905             *psSectorX = gubPBSectorX;
04906             *psSectorY = gubPBSectorY;
04907             *psSectorZ = gubPBSectorZ;
04908             return TRUE;
04909       }
04910       else if( gfWorldLoaded )
04911       {
04912             *psSectorX = gWorldSectorX;
04913             *psSectorY = gWorldSectorY;
04914             *psSectorZ = gbWorldSectorZ;
04915             if( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
04916             {
04917                   return TRUE;
04918             }
04919             return FALSE;
04920       }
04921       else
04922       {
04923             *psSectorX = 0;
04924             *psSectorY = 0;
04925             *psSectorZ = -1;
04926             return FALSE;
04927       }
04928 }

04930 void AutoBandageFinishedCallback( UINT8 ubResult )

04932       SetupDoneInterface();

04934 
04935 BOOLEAN ProcessLoyalty()
04936 {
04937       if( !gpAR ) return FALSE;
04938 
04939       if( PlayerMercsInSector( gpAR->ubSectorX, gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 ) )
04940             return TRUE;
04941 
04942       if( GetTownIdForSector(  gpAR->ubSectorX,  gpAR->ubSectorY ) != BLANK_SECTOR ||
04943             IsThisSectorASAMSector(   gpAR->ubSectorX,  gpAR->ubSectorY, 0 ) )
04944             return TRUE;
04945 
04946       return FALSE;
04947 }
